ol ripot bilong Robert Cornall.Na mipela ibin save long ol sutim tok long ol wokpainim bilong mipela yet na em ino wok bilong mi long toktok long ol despela.Em samting bilong polis long mekim ol wokpianim long Island.Mipela ibin wok bung wantaim Polis long ol wokpainim bilong ol na bai mipela igo hed long wokbung wantaim ol wokpainim bilong polis long ol.SARAH FERGUSON Yu no min long mekim ol toktok long ol wokman bilong yu em kampani bilong yu yet ibin employim ol usait ibin paitim nogut na kilim wanpela asylum seeke usait ibin istap aninit long lukaut bilong yu.CHRIS MANNING Well mipela sore long despela asua ibin kamap long despela nait sore tur long despela asua ibin mekim na Reza Berati ibin idai na tu long ol narapela lain na ol wokman bilong mipela ibin kisim bagrap longen SARAH FERGUSON questiontrutru em wanem samting tru <NUM> traim halavim or mekim sampela samting long lain lain i kisim bagrap na man idai longen.CHRIS MANNING Well olsem mi tok point bilong mi long yu i olsem igat ol wokpainim iwok long igo hed nau.Mipela mekim olgeta samting mi iken insait long Senate inquiry.Wok bilong mipela long despela i bilong sapotim ol wokpainim bilong Polis.Mipela ibin givim planti tingting na stori long Robert Cornall inquiry usiat nau i raitim kamap pinisi ol wokpainim bilongen na mipela bai igo hed long wokbung long ol despela wokpainim.SARAH FERGUSON Sore tasol ol despela ol wokpainim oli tokaut pinis long pablic insait long Australia.Mi ting em stret long oli laikim yu long wanem ol tingting yu igat long ol wokman bilong yu we ol ripot itok ol ibin kamapim ol pait long ol asylum seeker.Wanem ol tingting bilong yu long ol ibin painim ait pinis long usait istap insait.CHRIS MANNING Well yes mipela sutim tok long usiat ol memba bilong ol wokman i kalapim bilong ol lo maski insait long PNG or Australia.Olsem na mi tok mipela igo hed long sapotim ol wokpainim bilong polis long wanem ol rot mipela iken na long ol narapela wokpainim iwok long igo hed nau.Mipela bai igo hed long wokbung wantaim ol despela wokpainim bilong lukim olsem usiat ol lain i brukim lo na krangi pasin i mas sanap long aie bilong kot.Insait long Solomon Islands wankain olsem long sampela hap bilong Pacific solar pawa i wok long kamap wanpela bigpela samting bilong bringim pawa bilong halavim ol komuniti.Solar pawa i stretim sidaun bilong pipol long planti rot olsem long health sasim mobile phone na sevim moni em pipol isve lusim long petrol diesel na kerosin.Tasol taim Solar pawa kamap planti nau ol narapela sans bilong pipol long wokim bisnis tu igo bigpela na planti na long antap long island bilong Malaita wanpela tingting nau iwok long halavim ol meri long technical sait bilong girapim solar pawa bilong ol yet bilong halavim ol long bisnis bilong ol.Long yar igo pinis ol ibin bringim ol solar panels igo long ol komuniti long ol hap bilong Malaita.Tasol ol ibin bungim heve long stretim ol masin taim ol igo bagarap olsem long despela eria ol skulim ol pipol long lukautim na stretim ol na ol despela lain ibin istap insait long ol bigpela taun olsem long Auki na Honiara na ino long ol ples we pipol i nidim ol halavim longen.Ol despela lain ino save igo insait long ol ples planti taim olsem na ol inosave stretim ol masin hariap we despela isave mekim pipol lusim pawa na ol samting long haus.Olsem na Pacific Private Sector Development Initiative aninit long Asian Development Bank ibin lonsim wanpela traim project bilong stretim ol despela heve na tu bilong rereim halavim moni long ol women.Ol bai skulim ol hasples pipol insait long south west village na kisim fopela foa man hostage na karim ol igo long village bilong ol na kililim wanpela long ol na holim tripela narapela yet olsem hostage.Mr Laukai i tok ol poli i rilisim pinis ol hostage iusim strong blong ol paitim nating nating ol pipal oa bagarapim ol propati blong ol narapla.Tasol Polis Komisina Tom Kulunga ibin askim ol lida blong polis long holim kuik wanpla miting blong toktok ol risev polis long wok blong ol na tu bai oli mas statim ken ol polis perade long wanwan wik.Prins William na meri blong em Duchess blong Cambridge bai igo lukluk long Australia long mun April na oli dispela save man oa ol researchers istap long Australia National University ibin painim olsem ol binating blong malaria isave iusim ol pump long putim aut ol salt long bodi blong em na bihain kamapim nupela kain drag long pasim dispela pump.Dispela pump ken i putim salt long binatang igo inap emi kilim em.Profesa Kiaran Kirk husait i wanpela memba blong dispela wok painim tim itok binatang malaria i rausim ol salt olsem wara insait long bot.If you've got a leaky boat that's leaking lots of water just like the parasite is leaking lots of salt you need a pump to push the water out of the boat he told the ABC.And if you stop that pump working the boat fills with water and the boat sinks.If you stop the salt pump working the parasite fills with salt and the parasite sinks.Professa Kirk itok ol saintis nau iwok long hope dispela ol binatang ino winim wok blong ol.It's a continual race.We develop a drug the parasite becomes resistant we need a new drug.Hopefully a new drug will work for a long time.But in terms of saying someone's cured malaria yes you can use a drug to treat malaria patients for some years but you've got to continually make new drugs.Executive direkta blong Institute President Jose Ramos-Horta husa tnau bai pinis long wok bilong em i presentim Indonesian lida wantaim wanpela medal of honour.President Yudhoyono bai bungim Praim Mninsta Xanana Gusmao na bai igo stap long seremoni bilong makim tru niupela President Taur Matan Ruak pastaim long Independence Restoration Day em bai stat tumoro.Federal Oposison i laikim gavman long tok klia long ol ripot olsem Australia ilaik baim wanpela ten sikis sikstin ol laif bot bilong karim ol asylum seeker igo bek long Indonesia.Ol ripot bilong Fairfax media na wanpela niuspepa insait long West Australian ripot olsem gavman i wok long rere long baim ol bigpela laif bot igat ol strongpela pawa longen bilong salim ol asylum seeker igo bek long Indonesia sapos ol painim ol long ol bot ino gutpela longen.Despela nius ibin kamap long ples klia aste olsem ino long taim igo pinis Nevi bilong Australia ibin salim tupela bot igo bek long Indonesia.Immigration Minister Scott Morrison inolaik tokaut long sapos despela stori i tru or nogat na em tok tasol olsem gavman bai mekim ol toktok long samting emi kolim operational matters.Tasol acting immigration mausman bilong Labor Mark Dreyfus ibin tokim AM olsem igat nid bilong gavman long tok klia long wanem samting i kamap.We are being left to guess what our Navy is being asked to do that is not acceptable em i tok.The only justification for this cover up relationship with Indonesia.Greens i sutim tok long despela plen taim Senator Sarah Hanson-Young itok boda proteckson polisi bilong gavman i wok long bungim heve First we heard they were going to stop the boats then they said we'll buy back the boats now they're going to start giving away boats em itok.Fairfax report i lukim ol stori bilong Defence we i tok despela ol laif bot bai was long ol ol kain trick pasin bilong ol people smuggler em ol isave usim ol olpela fishing bot na bagarapim ol bilong mekim ol authoriti bilong Australia long halavim na kisim ol aut.Despela ripot i tok despela ol rejection of policies that resemble the pushing back the boats em itok.Mr Natalegawa itok tu olsem emi save toktok wantem minista blong foran afeas blong Australia Julie Bishop olgeta dei blong traem long streim ol heve blong ol wok spae.Emi tok tu olsem em bai kisim longpla taem liklik long stretim despla wari namel long Indonesia na Australia.Mr Natalegawa maintains that it will take time to minista blong Australia long taim ia Kevin Rudd long atendim dispela climate change conference long Bali long <NUM>.Tupela lida wantaim ibin wanbel long wokbung long mekim gut moa wokporoman blong tupela.Tasol ol pepa we Snowden i givim aut hait na The Guardian i ripotim i soim olsem DSD na NSA i laik wokim spae operesen long taim ya.As tingting blong tupela nau em long kisim gutpela save long nait na taim bikpela sea i kamap.Bikpela sea i min olsem oli pasim ol wok painim long tede Sarere moning.Niusman blong ABC long Indonesia George Robert ibin tokim ABC moning karen affeas olsem ol Australia Solomon Islands Business Forum na Trade Expo we ol ibin holim long Brisbane long last Friday.Laik blong Papua New Guinea long stap insaet long Australian NRL i kisim sampla halvim wantem long despla tupla wik ikam.Emi tok olsem It's been two years of planning it's been two years of sourcing funding and sponsorship.We've come up with preliminary names and colours and the structure of that have the potential at QRL or NRL level.It's a rugby league mad country it's the sleeping giant of rugby league in the world and through this program it's given an opportunity for these players to be able to show their wares and show the talent that they do have.I think people will be pretty surprised it's like it will be a continuous production line of rugby league talent into the Australian competition in the future.Oli ting olsem rugby team blong PNG bai save pilai egensim ol Queensland team long PNG iet na PNG gavman bai save givim ol strongpla sekiuriti long ol players blong Australia tingting long mekim despla pasin blong en long Fiji.Military forces in any serious country do contingency planning which doesn't entail having explicit intentions to carry those plans into action.But wokbung long ol kofi bisnis.Milne Bay Provins i tingting long kirapim ol wokbung ol iet long helpim pipol i lusim haus blong ol taem Saiklon Ita i kamapMilne Bay Provins insait long PNG ibin bungim stat blong Saiklon Ita pastaem long em i hamarim North hap blong Queensland long Australia.Ol ripot ino kilia gut long displa taem long ol bagarap oa sapos pipol ibin dai taem strongpla win na saiklon i ron igo olsem long Australia.Solowara i karamapim Milne Bay Provins na planti taem em i hat long kisim ol toktok hariap long displa ol kaen weather.Tasol Gavana blong Provins Titus Philemon i tok em wantaim Provinsol Disasta Komiti ibin holim tupla miting wantaim ol pipol long displa wikend long painim aut moa long ol bagarap long district na aelan.Wanpla bikpla tingting bung i kamap long wikend strong long displa tingting blong helpim pipol husait i bungim bagarap.Long Trinde displa wik ol pipol bai wilim ol wheelbarrow blong ol raun long Alotau kepital blong provins na tu ol pipol husait wok skeiuriti long ditensan senta itokim Dateline program blong SBS televisan olsem ol narapla man asailam sika isave reipim ol narapla man asailam sika long wanpla kompaon em ol man tasol isave stap long en.Emi sutim tok long gavman blong Australia olsem oli save lusim ol despla man em oli save reipim ol long wankaen ples olsem ol man husat isave mekim ol despla kaen pasin nogut.Emi tok tu olsem despla kaen pasin blong reip isave kamap olgeta taem na sampla man em oli save reipim ol isave laik kilim ol iet.Tasol imigresian dipatman itok oli no kisim ol toktok olsem despla kaen pasin nogut iwok long kamap long senta.Despla bikpla toktok i kamap sampla dei bihaen long gavman blong Australia ibin tokaut long nupla loa oa polisi blong long salim olgeta asailam sika husat isave kamap long Australia long ol bot bai go na stap olgeta long Papua New Guinea.Mr St George itok Imigresian dipatman blong Australia isave ronim despla kemp emi bagarap olgeta winim ol haus kalabus.Emi tok tu olsem sopos despla kaen kemp istap long Australia bai oli kolim olsem haus oa ples blong ol Dok na bai oli kalabusim ol laen husat i ronim despla senta.ABC isave olsem imigreisan minista Minister Tony Burke igat laik long toktok wantem Mr St George bihaen toktok blong en long SBS televisan progrem.Aninit long despla nupla tok oraet namel long Australia na PNG ol asailam sika husat ikamap long ol bot long Australia olgeta bai go long ol narapla kantri we bai oli lukluk gut na skelim askim blong ol.Bai oli mekim Manus Island senta igo bikpla blong kisim planti moa refiugi tasol igat wari olsem ol ditensan senta long Manus na Nauru bai no nap long kisim olgeta refiugi.Na Foran Minista Bob Carr itok Australia bai askim narapla kantri long Pacific rijan long lukautim wanpla asailam ditensan senta wankaen olsem long nauru na PNG.Long PNG papa blong MV Rabaul Queen ferry i tok sip i bin karim moa pasenja taim em i go daun long solwara.Papa blong wanpla ferry em i bin go daun long solwara long Papua New Guinea i tokim wanpla wok-painim-aut olsem namba blong ol pasenja long sip i bin bikpla moa winim ol narapla taim bipo taim em i go daun.PNG niusman Liam Fox i tok Captain Peter Sharp planti long olgeta media long Pacific i stap long taim ia.Em itok long despla nau oli no kirapim despla Pacific Media Ombudsman long wanem em bai no makim trutru laik blong ol media blong Pacific.Mr Steven itok as tingting blong kirapim Pacific Media Ombudsman em blong kamapim sampla loa we emi ken helpim media long bihaenim gut ol loa blong media long ol wanwan kantri blong Pacific.Em itok oli no nap kamapim iet despla Ombudsman long wanem igat planti toktok iet long mekim pastem oli statim despla Pacific Meddia Ombudsman.Wari blong ol asailam sika nau i kamap olsem bikpla toktok na tingting ken blong Praim Minista blong Australia.Praim Minista Rudd bai toktok long despla wari wantem President Susilo Bang Bang Yudiono taem em bai mekim raon blong en igo long jakrata long wik bihaen.Em bai stap long bikpla miting blong ol lida blong Australia na Indonesia em bai kamap long Fonde na Fraide.Oli ting olsem wari blong ol asailam sika bai kamap olsem wanpla bikpla toktok em bai husat i laik kam long Australia em ol pipal husat igat moni na oli laik kam nating long Australia.Wanpela wok painim em Lowy Institute long Sydney ibin mekim na ibin soim olsem ol pipol blong gavman long pasim ol forena long wokim bisnis long sait long kava long ailan blong Pentecost.Long narapela stori Presiden blong Penama provins Lonsdale Hinge ibin kamap long Port Vila na i wok long kava fama na i expotim igo long Amerika.Aelan blong Pentecost em i nabawan i save planim planti kava we ol i save salim long tufala taon blong Port Vila na long Luganville.Long wik igo pinis Pentecost bai kamap sampela taim long wik bihain.Ol kaunding long Papua New Guinea general eleksan i soim olsem ol indipendent kendidets i wok long kisim gutpela risalt winim ol politikal pati.Ol risalt bilong gut despla moni em Australia bai givim em.Mr O'Neill na i askim Coalition long respektim gut gavman blong en taem emi mekim ol toktok wantem PNG Gavman.Emi tok tu olsem Papua New Guinea ino laik sidaon tasol na kisim ol despla kaen toktok blong Coalition.I think those details were politely not discussed and I think it's unfair on them Australian politicians to try and drag us into the debate.We understand the elections are coming around the corner but please let us debate on facts.The PNG government has also made its displeasure known through its High Commission in Canberra.PNG's High Commissioner to Australia Charles Lepani has released a statement warning Australian politicians to observe international protocols and courtesies when discussing relations with other friendly sovereign nations.He says Australian politicians should not impugn the dignity of our leaders who are assisting Australia with the complex issue of asylum seekers.Coalition being very respectful Hockey says Opposition treasury spokesman Joe Hockey says the Coalition has not disrespected PNG through its comments on foreign aid.I think the Coalition and all Australian politicians have been very respectful of the relationships we have with Papua New Guinea and other jurisdictions as well he said.But let me just say this under the Coalition there will be no blank cheques from Australian taxpayers to any other country.Mr Hockey has suggested the price tag for the Government's policy to send all asylum seekers who arrive by boat to be processed and resettled in PNG could be billions of dollars.Mr Hockey says he assumes Australia will have to pay Centrelink and Medicare benefits for refugees who end up living there for the rest of their lives.I assume that is exactly what is going to happen he said.That's why the Government hasn't told us how much this is going to cost because you are looking at billions billions and billions of dollars for as far as you can see for basically setting up an Australian colony in Papua New Guinea.Former immigration minister Brendan O'Connor says the obligations owed to the refugees will be shared between Australia and PNG.He has also rejected Mr Hockey's assertions.If the arrival of vessels slowed then the hypothetical that's been put forward by Joe Hockey doesn't exist that is thousands of people over years going to be settled in PNG he said.I think this will see a cessation over time of vessels which means the cohort we're talking about is relatively small.The extraordinary broadside from the Papuan leader follows a subtle public criticism from Indonesia about the Coalition's turn back the boats policy.Indonesia's president recently signed a communiqu calling on leaders to refrain from unilateral action that would undermine regional cooperation on people smuggling.Tok sapot blong Kevin Rudd long gay marriage long Q A blong ABC TV last nait i bikpela samting pipol i toktok longen dispela moning bihain Praim Minista i arapela sevis tu bai istap insait long en.Mr Parkop itok tingting blong stretim gut Koki Maket em tingting blong offis blong en na oli givim igo long Australia long lukluk long en.Tasol Mr Parkop itok million kina em moni blong PNG yet.Na Mr Parkop ino tokaut klia long hamas moni bai Australia gavaman bai givim igo long nupela Koki Maket projek tasol itok oli hamamas long gutpela luksave blong Australia gavaman.Wau na Bulolo distrik long Morobe Provins long PNG i wari long conditions blong ol rot bekos long ren.Mun December na Januari ino gutpela taim long ol pipol istap long Wau na Bulolo distrik blong Morobe Provins long Papua New Guinea.Distrik manager blong Bulolo Tae Gwambelek itok long taim blong mun Decemba na Januari em i taim blong bikpela ren na i save kamapim bikpela ol blong ol Mr.Sam Basil husait tu i deputi lida blong Opposisen no wan bel long National gavaman ino bin nap long givim distrik funding blong ol lokel memba olsem oli ken lukluk long kain heve olsem.Papua New Guinea gavman i wok long tingting sapos em i ken muvim taim blong eleksen igo sikis mun bihain long mun June.Gavman i tok <NUM> pesent tasol blong populesin samting olsem tu milian tasol em i mas bihainim ol investment loa blong Bougainville.Papua New Guinea igat nem long ol art makim olgeta hap kantri tasol nau wanpela lain student na ol olpela street kids ibin wok long soim blong Australian i kamapim wanpela wei wantaim yus blong teknoloji we ino kostim planti moni blong lukim malaria long bodi blong man pastaim long em i kamap bikpela.Taim amlaria ino stap nau ia long yusim long kontrolim spred blong Malaria.Malaria i kilim dai planti tausen long wanwan yar Maski ibin gat gutpela wok oli wokim pinis long daunim malaria long wol planti handred tausan pipol i gohet long dai yet long dispela sik long wanem em i had long kisim tritmen.Mr Wood itok olsem gutpela samting long dispela niu infrared technology i olsem em ino nidim saintis long save yusim em ini Indonesia bai ino luk gut long tupela kantri.Maski yumi no wanbel long wei yumi takolim dispela isu bikpela samting em long no ken putim laif blong ol pipol long danger em ibin tok.Wanpla tingting i kamap olsem ol kantri blong Pacific imas kirapim wanpla sevis blong lukautim olgeta moni halvim long taem blong ol disasta.Ol Pacific Island kantri imas kamapim wanpla sevis blong putim moni olgeta yia long helpim long ol taem blong disasta oa taem nogut.Hai Komisian blong Papua New Guinea long Solomon Islands i mekim despla toktok tede taem Solomon Islands iwok long traem long stretim ol wok blong gavman na bisnis bihaenim bikpla disasta.Fred Yakasa husat ibin wok bifo olsem Polis Komisina long Papua New Guinea itok ol disasta isave hamarim ol kantri long rijan olgeta taem olsem na oli mas gat moni long givim hariap long wonem kantri i bungim heve.Mr Yakasa itok em i sore tru long lukim ol pipal long Solomon Islands i bungim heve na Papua New Guinea em i tok bai givim sampla halvim klostu.Ol delegets long International Coral Reef Symposium long Cairns long Australia bai toktok tude long wanem kain birua na heve em cliamte change i givim igo long ol coral reefs raun long wold Mo long <NUM> ol saveman na meri o scientist ibin igo bung aste bilong toktok long Consensus Statement on Climate Chage na Coral Reefs na ibin harim olsem ol rifs nau i bungim birua ikam long raising si tempretsa na ova-divelopment.Ol stori tru i wok long kamap olsem ol tempretsa bilong si i go antap long haf a digri long las tenpela yar ol posin long si igo antap long <NUM> pesent na si level i go antap long samting olsem <NUM> sentimitas.Peter Doherty bilong Australian Institute of Marine Sicence i tok dispela ol senis ino ibin kamapim wanpela heve.Emi tok em nau i lukim na save long planti ol senis i kamap long ol kain kain ples olsem em i save i kamap tripela ten yar igo pinis na i luk olsem ino gat wanpela ol dispela senis bai i kamap gut.Dr Alana Grech bilong James Cook University i tok ol divelopment toktok oli holim nau bai i bringim bikpela halivim long longpela taim ikam bilong ol rif.Em i askim ol gavman i disainim mega ports wankain olsem ol ples balus na ol eria nau long ol bilong daunim ol heve na birua ol kago sip i ken nap bringim igo antap long Great Barrier Reef.Praim Minista Kevin Rudd i tokaut nau olsem Labor Party i lusim Federal Eleksan long Australia na bai em taim em i stap olsem niupela Praim Minista blong Australia.Mr Rudd itok em i save ol sapota blong Labor Party long kantri i sori.Em itokLabor i stap strong yet olsem wanpela politikal pati we bai wantaim Mendi taun.Ino gat iet kilia piksa oa stori long dispela bikpela ren na haiwara long eastern hap blong Southern Highlands tasol olsem Deputi Administreita Bravy Koensong i tokim Radio Australia i gat bikpela halvim ol pipol i nidim long namel taim.Foran Minista blong New Zealand Murray McCully na wan-wok blongen blong Australia Bob Carr i tok ol bai go long Fiji long wik i kam long wantaim militari gavman blong Fiji.I nabawan taim nau wanpela ripot i tok kilia long wanem climate change bai wokim long ol wanwan Kantri long Pacific Island region.Dispela wok painim aut bilong long en.Dokta blong Ms Suu Kyi itok emi sik long wonem emi wok hat tumas na emi no malolo liklik.Despla emi no nambawan taem em Ms Suu Kyi i sik taem emi wok long ronim ol ileksan kempein blong redi ibin dai long despla war.Oli putim tupla narapla nem blong tupla soljia em oli bin kilim ol long ol fait long Afghanistan husat ibin dai long despla yia igo pinis na nau nem blong ol istap long Roll Constitution here Konstitusen i laikim wanpela oa single-chamber <NUM> Palamen na holim eleksen bihain long olgeta fopela yar.Long mun January Fijian Gavman i bin rauseim draft constitution em wanpela sikis.Insait long niupela konstitusen i gat hap bilong free speach na bill of rights na i kirapim wanpela accountability na transparency commission em wok bilong em long glasim ol husat i holim ol bikpela wok long gavman.Konstitusen i laikim tu oli tisim ol Taukei na Fiji Hindi tok ples long olgeta level bilong primary school wantaim English.Federal Gavaman ino bin laik putim aut ol toktok long meri blongen Champa Somaratna i bin tok.My husband is an Australian citizen.We know the secret police have taken him.Without international intervention we know what they will do to him.Tasol Sri Lanka Police Superintendent Ajith Rohana i sakim dispela ol toktok.Em i tok dispela ol toktok ino tru.We totally deny that allegation we have not arrested Mr Kumar Gunarathnam em ibin tok.Em i tok Australia Secretary-General Tuiloma Neroni Slade too-ey loh-ma neh-rony slayde em Islands Business Magazine i holim Mr Haomae i tok em i toktok makim sikispela island nation.Em i tok oli no hama mas wantaem wei Forum Secretariat i bin mekim wok long makiim wanpela Chief Trade Advisor blong ol Pacific Islands.Wok blong Chief Trade Advisor ol Pacific Trade minista i bin kirapim long givim independent advice long ol toktok oa negotiations wantaem Australia na New Zealand long despela PACER Plus trade agreement.Mr Haomae i tok wei hau secretariat i bin mekim long makim advaisor i bin kisim longpela taim em i bin go isi isi na larim na larim pastaem oa delay longpela pastaem long makim advisor em i nongut.Em i autim wari blongem olsem ol wokman meri long secretariat i wok long traim long bagarapim independence despela Trade Advisors office.na tok olsem i luk olsem secretariat i wok long wari tumas long kontrolim moni oa finance long office.Mr Haomae em lida mausman blong Forum Island kantri long PACER Plus negotiations.Long pas blong em em i tokem i toktok makim Federated States of Micronesia Kiribati Nauru Samoa Solomon Islands na Vanuatu.Igat planti toktok igo kam long wok politk insait long Papua New Guinea bihain long polis ibin pasim olpela praim Minista Sir Michael Somare long go insait long banis blong Gavna Jenral.PNG niusman Liam Fox i ripot Sir Michael na laen sapota blongen ibin kamap long gavman haus we ol ibin ting Gavna Jenral bai makim em olsem lida blong caretaker government.Tasol taim ol i kamap samting olsem <NUM> polisman ibin tokim em olsem bai ol ino go insait long banis blong Gavman haus.Man husait ibin Attorney General bifo Sir Arnold Amet i tok orait bai ol i bihainim ol protocol wei wea ol imas raitim wanpela askim igo long gavna jenral.Asde nait minista.Mr O'Neil ibin tok em ino luksave long dispela kot oda bikos disisin blong ol i wan-sait.Longen em ibin tok paliment ibin sidaun ken tede long toktok long dispela heve tasol nao ol i pasim pastaim igo nap long Trinde.Dispela longwanem liklik namba blong ol MP tasol ibin kamap long haus paliment.Long namel taim President blong Autonomous Region blong Bougainville John Momis i tok em i blong halivim belisi pasin long taon.Oli kolim despela Maket Peace oa Wanbel Market.Yut Co-ordinator blong Kainantu Distrik long Eastern Highlands Province Yubi Masa i tok ol trabel olsem spak brus na bia na drag i save bagarapim laif olsem na ol yut iet i bungim dispela wantaim halvim blong lokal gavman na otoriti long painim wanbel na gutpela sidaun.Transparensy Vanuatu i lukim ol pasin blong solowara.Nautilus na PNG Gavman i sutim tok long wanpela narapela long brukim agriment ol i sainim.Insait long wanpela statement Nautilus i tok tupela sait nau i wanbel long makim foma chif Jastis blong Australia Murray Gleeson long stap insait long dispela koros blong ol.Dispela arbitration bung bai kamap nau long Sydney na ol i ting bai kisim sampela mun long pinisim Nautilus kampani i bilip wok main bai stat long Papua New Guinea long neks yar.Ol eleksan ofisal long Papua New Guinea i wok long mekim disisen sapos keteka praim minista Peter O'Neill i gat inap vot long tokaut long em olsem bosim oa kontrolim olgeta conditions.Queensland ibin winim gut State of Origin rugby pilai egensim New South Wales long Lang Park wantem <NUM> aste nait.With the referees cracking down on punch-ups following Paul Gallen's hit on Nate Myles in Origin I Trent Merrin sparked an all-in brawl mid-way through the second half after landing punches on Brent Tate.But the officials chose to send off two Maroons players as well as Tate and NSW team-mate Greg Bird to clamp down on the fisticuffs.I didn't expect four of them to go but that's just the way it goes and we get on with it Slater said of the send-offs.Blues blown away in first twenti minutes Queensland enjoyed an electric start going up <NUM> inside twenti minutes through Sam Thaiday and Darius Boyd's tries.Cooper Cronk's subtle pass found Thaiday charging through the gap as he barged his way over to score right of the posts on the four-minute mark.Following Thurston's conversion and penalty goal Boyd upped the agony for the visitors as he stole down the left wing to score Queensland's second try of the night.Normal service was resumed early in the second half when Boyd scored his second after receiving a gorgeous cut-out Thurston pass which put the Maroons <NUM> up after the TV ref checked the winger's grounding.NSW needed to pick things up and did so when Merrin appeared to throw a host of punches at Tate sparking a mass shoving match between the two sides.With strict no-punching rules in place it was no surprise to see Merrin sent to the cooler for ten minutes but Tate Bird and a very surprised Justin Hodges were also sin-binned in a stunning quadruple departure.But the lack of centres barely troubled the hosts as Greg Inglis leaped highest to score Queensland's fourth try as the Maroons went <NUM> up after Thurston's conversion.Brett Morris pulled one back for the Blues when he ran quickest to snatch up a well-floated Robbie Farah kick to score in the corner.But despite Queensland easing off in the dying stages the Maroons still had time to add two more points through Thurston's boot on the stroke of half-time to send the parochial <NUM> crowd home happy and hopeful of an unprecedented eighth-straight series triumph.Only Merrin should have been sent off says Gallen After the match Blues captain Paul Gallen said his side was overwhelmed in the first half with the first half-hour spent entirely on the defensive.They were pretty good they started good and give them a bit of credit a lot of things went against us early but that's the way it is he told Grandstand.There was four or five early penalties in that first <NUM> minutes it felt like all we did was just tackle but they played pretty good.Gallen said he was surprised with the quadruple sin-binning saying only team-mate Merrin should have been sent off.Four players in the sin bin I've got to be honest I think Trent Merrin was the only one that should have been in the sin bin he admitted.It's funny how they're going to police this rule in games like this but that's just the way it is.Queensland <NUM> D Boyd tu S Thaiday G Inglis tries J Thurston tri foa cons tu tu pens New South Wales sikis B Morris ibin fosim ol igo bek.Oli tok oli ibin lusim wanpela bot wantaim nogat inap fiul na drift long si long sampela de.Lon aste Imigresen Minista Scott Morrison i tok ol ripot olsem sip bilong Australia i bin sut igo antap long air taim em ibin bungim narapela asylum seeker bot ino longwe tumas long Christmas Island.Makim ripot bilong Fairfax media oli tanim igo bek long Indonesia namba tri bot.Mausman bilong minista bilong politiks law na security long Indonesia Dioko Suyanto i tok dipatment i wok wantaim foren ministri long investiget long ol toktok.Mausman Agus Ruchyan Barnas i tok tanim bek ol asylum seeker bot ating i bringim <NUM> UN Refugee Convention em Australian ibin sainim.Mr Barnas i tok Indonesia i no ken putim wanpela komplen igo nap oli painimaut na save gut long ol toktok na i tokaut ken olsem Indonesia ino laikim tru polisi bilong Australia long tanim bek ol bot.Long sem taim Indonesian navy mausman Colonel Julius Widjojono i tok oli nau moniterim ol eria bilong si we oli save olsem ol Australian otoroti i tanim igo bek ol bot.Ol ibin tokim ol asylum seekers long lukautaim ol iet taim oli tanim ol igo bek.Dispela divelopment i kamap long taim we i gat ol ripot tu long oli salim igo bek wanpela grup bilong <NUM> asylum seekers insait long las wik.Fairfax midia ripot olsem oli i bin trikim ol asylum seekers bilong Pakistan na Bangladesh long ting olsem oli kisim ol igo long Christmas Island bihain long oli bugim bot iblong ol sikispela de igo pinis.Tasol ripot i tok ol i bin putim ol dispela man igo antap long wanpela bright orange lifeboat klostu long nambis bilong Indonesia.Makim iet toktok bilong dispela ripot ol ibin putim ol Indonesian kapten i lukatutim dispela laifboat na ol givim ol asylum seekers four-pages document.Oli tok dispela document i tok painim aut i bigpela samting.This discovery is paradigm shifting Prof Scheffer i tok.It means that if you have focal epilepsy and there is no cause known then this gene should be tested to look for a betri long salim singal igo nap long April seven Conditions improve but search still complex The head of the search operation former Australian Defence Force Air Chief Marshal Angus Houston says the mission is one of the most difficult ever undertaken anywhere in the world and it will continue for some time.I can't think of a set of circumstances in a search and recovery as demanding and as complex as this he said yesterday.We have to keep searching and searching with vigour because what's really vital here is to find some wreckage some debris on the surface of the ocean.He says a lack of detailed information about the plane's final movements makes the search extremely difficult.Over time if we don't find anything on the surface we are going to have to think about what we do next he said.The weather bureau says conditions in the search area are expected to be favourable today with good visibility and light winds.RAAF Flight Lieutenant Dave O'Biten who piloted one of the search aircraft yesterday says teams remain determined despite the frustration of not finding anything.We're finding it frustrating because we're trying to help everyone out he said.We want to get out there and find something just as much as everyone else does.Cockpit communications show nothing unusual Mr Najib's arrival comes two days after Malaysian authorities released the full transcript of communications between the pilots of <NUM> and air traffic controllers which they say showed nothing unusual.The <NUM> separate transmissions over almost <NUM> minutes are thick with air-traffic and navigational jargon and give no hint of trouble aboard the ill-fated plane.The transcript shows Malaysian air traffic control first bidding <NUM> good night as it instructs the pilots to contact controllers in Vietnam over which the plane was due to fly.The final entry from just after wan <NUM> comes from one of the two <NUM> pilots who says good night Malaysian three seven zero.The plane disappeared from radar shortly thereafter and is yet to be found though Malaysian investigators believe it was deliberately diverted and flew on for hours to the Indian Ocean where it is presumed to have crashed.The transcript and particularly the final words from <NUM> has been the subject of much speculation following earlier statements by authorities and the airline that the last transmission from the plane was a casual All right good night.That apparent non-standard sign-off fuelled speculation that one of the pilots either captain Zaharie Ahmad Shah <NUM> or first officer Fariq Abdul Hamid <NUM> diverted the plane on purpose.A statement from Malaysia's acting transport minister Hishammuddin Hussein said the transcript was initially held as part of the police investigation but gave no other reason for the delay.Police rule out passengers as suspects Malaysia's police chief has ruled out all passengers as suspects in the disappearance of flight <NUM>.Khalid Abu Bakar says none of the almost <NUM> passengers was involved in hijacking sabotage or had personal or psychological problems.The focus of the criminal investigation is still on the cabin crew especially the pilots but officials have not yet indicated any possible motive.Without any concrete leads it has made the search for the missing aircraft difficult.Officials insist the final path the plane took was the result of a deliberate action by someone on board but after <NUM> days the police chief says it is possible the case may never be solved.ABC wires_ Vive President blong Indonesia long bipo husat i wanpela that the implementation of the findings of the report subsequent investigations and so on will take a long time em ibin tok.It will probably end up in the hands of a new government That is one of the great problems we face in Papua New Guinea in that it doesn't appear to matter which government the results of the report end up with no further action is taken.Mr Stephens i tok ol imas painim ol husat isave sanap makim Oposisan long Foran Afeas itokim Coalition olsem Mr O'Neill nau i bosim olgeta moni oa Aid em Australia isave givim igo long Papua New Guinea.I luk olsem Australia bai apim wanpla toktok emi bin givim igo long oposisan long wik igo pinis we emi bin tok despla tok oraet bai kamapim planti gutpla samting.Mr O'Neill ibin tokim ABC olsem emi no wanbel tru long harim olsem ol bin mekim planti long ol despla toktok.Australia Oposisan lida Tony Abbott itoka olsem PNG bai no nap lukautim na iusim gut despla moni em Australia bai givim em.Mr O'Neill na i askim Coalition long respektim gut gavman blong en taem emi mekim ol toktok wantem PNG Gavman.Emi tok tu olsem Papua New Guinea ino laik sidaon tasol na kisim ol despla kaen toktok blong Coalition.I think those details were politely not discussed and I think it's unfair on them Australian politicians to try and drag us into the debate.We understand the elections are coming around the corner but please let us debate on facts.The PNG government has also made its displeasure known through its High Commission in Canberra.PNG's High Commissioner to Australia Charles Lepani has released a statement warning Australian politicians to observe international protocols and courtesies when discussing relations with other friendly sovereign nations.He says Australian politicians should not impugn the dignity of our leaders who are assisting Australia with the complex issue of asylum seekers.Coalition being very respectful Hockey says Opposition treasury spokesman Joe Hockey says the Coalition has not disrespected PNG through its comments on foreign aid.I think the Coalition and all Australian politicians have been very respectful of the relationships we have with Papua New Guinea and other jurisdictions as well he said.But let me just say this under the Coalition there will be no blank cheques from Australian taxpayers to any other country.Mr Hockey has suggested the price tag for the Government's policy to send all asylum seekers who arrive by boat to be processed and resettled in PNG could be billions of dollars.Mr Hockey says he assumes Australia will have to pay Centrelink and Medicare benefits for refugees who end up living there for the rest of their lives.I assume that is exactly what is going to happen he said.That's why the Government hasn't told us how much this is going to cost because you are looking at billions billions and billions of dollars for as far as you can see for basically setting up an Australian colony in Papua New Guinea.Former immigration minister Brendan O'Connor says the obligations owed to the refugees will be shared between Australia and PNG.He has also rejected Mr Hockey's assertions.If the arrival of vessels slowed then the hypothetical that's been put forward by Joe Hockey doesn't exist that is thousands of people over years going to be settled in PNG he said.I think this will see a cessation over time of vessels which means the cohort we're talking about is relatively small.The extraordinary broadside from the Papuan leader follows a subtle public criticism from Indonesia about the Coalition's turn back the boats policy.Indonesia's president recently signed a communiqu calling on leaders to refrain from unilateral action that would undermine regional cooperation on people smuggling.Vanuatu polis i tok ol i save long neim blong tupela marit blong Dutch oa Netherlands em ol ibin kilim insait long kapital Port Vila long wik igo pinis.Deputi Polis Komisina Arthur Caulton i tok em i gat <NUM> ofisa i wok long en long sarere.Ms Bishop itok olsem I have approved a ten million package of humanitarian assistance.This comprises the urgent deployment of an Australian medical assistance team at a cost of about wan million tri million to be deployed through Australian non-government organisations foa million to the United Nations flash appeal.We will also contribute wan million for additional food up on to the land and the island itself is covered by very very dense bush and you have to use a machete to get through.Ol asailam sika long wanpela bot oli painim long solwara long Western Australia long senta.Oli bin tokim dokta long imas redi long ol bagarap bai kamap long ol tasol dokta Otto Numan itok inogat ol asailam sika oa ol gad i kisim bagarap oli bringim ol long haus sik.Refugi Action waia long dispela nait yet na riot polis ibin go long stopim ol trabel.Ol toktok ino klia wanem samting ibin kamapim ol dispela trabel oa hamas ol asailam sika ibin ronawei Immigraisen Minista Scott Morrison ibin tok stret olsem ibin gata sampela trabel long senta aste nait.Emi tok ol toktok emi bin kisim olsem ol wokman na meri ibin orait na senta ibin orait nogat trabel.Mr Morrison ibin tok stret olsem polis ibin arrestim sampela ol asailam sika na sampela ibin go kisim marasin long bodi blong ol.Emi tok tu olsem ibin gat sampela bagarap long ol property long senta.Mr Morrison itok em ol bai inonap stap long Papua New Guinea.Mausman blong Opposisen long Immigraisen Richard Marles ibin askim gavaman long imas putim aut na tok klia long wanem ol samting ibin kamap kuik taim tru.Mr tausen pipal ibin spendim nait igo pinis long ol seif eria or evacuation centres na ol otoriti i tok ol bai ino save iet long ol bagarap ikam nap sampela tam tude.Long tete moning wan handet busfaifa i lait iet na oli kontrolim mo long <NUM> long ol.Bikpela heve tru i stap long Central Coast we oli putim aut ol imenjensi woning na oli tokim ol pipal long igo long ol seif ples taim paia i wok long lait long Ruttleys Road klostu long Wyong.Wanpela imenjensi woning i stap iet tu long paia long Lithgow long Blue Mountains.Tatu long pes na bodi i wanpla pasin kastom blong Pacific pipol.Samoa i progression of HIV-AIDS but we need to get at the root.We know that current therapy is able to keep the active virus under control it suppresses the active virus to undetectable levels.But if one stops taking one's medications that active virus is resupplied by the latent virus so what we need to attack is the latent virus the source of the active virus and that's what these compounds do.Plen single adult males going across.In my view you shouldn't have family groups housed in the same area as where you've got single adult males.You need to be able to separate different groups and I want na stilim graon blong ol asples pipal.Bosmeri blong Oxfam Helen Szoke itok despla fopla Bank National Australia Bank NAB Commonwealth CBA Westpac na ANZ ino bihaenim gut ol nem na mak blong ol olsem think there is a real problem around due diligence around them actually focusing on their investment practices and making sure they put their money where their mouth is in terms of ethical and sustainable investment practices in these agricultural businesses overseas.Dr Szoke itok tu olsem ol wok painimaut em Oxfam ibin mekim i soim olsem ol despla Bank isave wok wantem ol kampani em oli save mekim ol korap pasin long ol wok blong agrikalsa na moni em oli save givim i winim samting olsem olsem twenti billion.Emi tok tu olsem It's in the banks best interests to know that when they invest in a company that has an agricultural business that the company is actually producing what it says it's going to produce that it's actually acquired the land legally and then it looks after the communities that are impacted by that investment.Westpac iwok wantem kampani em oli sutim tok long en long korap loging bisnis.Despla ripot itok olsem Westpac Bank long Papua New Guinea isave givim long pipal blong kantri long givim tingting long en.Chairman blong Transparency PNG Lawrence Stephens i tokim Radio Australia em i bilip gavman bai lukluk long ol tingting blong ol lain i go agensim wantok blong ol i mekim treining.MORRISON Man despla emi wanpla samting em mipla i hamamas stret long en na mipla i laik kisim foto wantem Tim Cahill na yes mipla i laikim em long sainim otograf blong Socceroos team.MARK Ol despla pikinini em oli hap blong wanpla kaen progrem em oli kolim John Moriarty Football.Na direkta blong en em pikinini man blong Mr Moriarty James.JAMES MORIARITY John na mi Moriarty klostu tru ibin kisim bikpla nem long football.Long <NUM> John Moriarty ibin kamap olsem nambawan Aborigini man long sanap makim Australia tasol wanpla wik bihaen tasol long oli bin makim em ibin helpim em long soccer.Ol meri na mama long Papua New Guinea i les tru nau long vailans egensim ol meri na despla pasin nogut imas stop.Ol meri long i les nau long kainkain nogut pasin ol i save kisim na i mekim protes long ol dispela vailans egensim ol meri imas stop.Despla toktok ibin kamap tede long wanpla bikpla protes emi bin kamap long Lae Morobe provins taem ol meri ibin holim wanpla Australia long PNG.Jason Day na Adam Scott i wim World Cup of Golf blong Australia we Day i winim individual taitel.Jason Day na Adam Scott displa tupla Australia golfer i winim World Cup of Golf we sapos em i wanpela bikpela important dei blong Burma Ms Suu Kyi i bin tok I think only time will tell.PNG ekting polis komisina Simon Kauba itok long imas gat gutpela wok bung namel long Australia ol.Dispela ol toksave Mr Kauba itok oli putim pinis igo long ol lain blong Australia Federal polis na ol ofisa blong PNG polis.Ol tred Union ofisel itok ol woka blong OK Tedi husat ibin straek stat ibin wok long senta long sampela taim.Mr O'Conner i tok sampela long ol toktok ibin rong.I tru Minista i tok medikal fesilities long senta ino gat inap ol samting taim oli setim ap long fest taim tasol ol fesilities i impruv pinis.Em i tok i bin gat ol improvments igo long ol marasn na ol masin bilong halivim ol sik pipal long senta na tu long ples bilong ol pipal i sidaun malolo na Islands longwanem em i wei bilong pasim ol narapela ino ken kisim bot ikam long Australia.Em ino nap ibin nap long tingting long mekim ol senis long husat man meri na pikinini antap long Manus Provins longwanem ol ibin mekim disisen pinis na i wanpela hatpela disisen long lukim olsem oli stopim pipal kalap igo antap long bot em ino gutpela long sel long si ikam long Australia.Scathing self-assessment Long stat bilong dispela mun Australian Imigresen Dipatment ibin autim toktok ino wan bel long stap bilong temporary accommodation bilong em bilong ol asylym seekers antap long ailan na i tok ol living arengment i kremp na presnetim risks long safety na health bilong ol.Long wanpela pepa bilong em igo long Palamentary Standing Committee long Public Works dipatment i tok i gat nid long holim <NUM>.Dipatmen ibin tok dispela senta ino gat gutpela pawa saplai no gat inap wara na ol bildings na tents i gat sotpela taim long oli uisim.Tasol Oposisen Imigresen mausman Scott Morrison long wanpela naivi bot HMAS Choules.Meri husat igo pas long Women Arise PNG long Port Moresby itok dealth Pelanty ino ansa long heve long vailans agensim ol meri long Papua New Guinea.Women Arise PNG i laikim strongpela mekim save agensim ol lain isave kamapim vailans agensim women na repim ol imas kisim strongpela mekimsave.Tasol Tim lida bilong Women Arise PNG long Port Moresby Esther Igo itok bilip.Ms Igo i toktok long dispela long bekim toktok blong PNG Attorney General na Justice Minister Kerenga Kua long tok olsem gavman i laik kamapaim death penalty long ol crimes againsim ol meri.Mr Kua ibin tok olsem gavman i les pinis nau long ol kainkain pasin blong vailans agensim ol meri na kain kilim oli dai nating ol meri long kantri na i laik long kamapim niupela na strongpela loa agensim ol dispela kain kraim.Wanpla narapla man ken i dai bihaenim ol bagarap emi bin kisim long sampla laen ibin katim em long naif taem emi bin wokabaut wantem wanpla laen blong Australia long Morobe provinsNamel long sevenpla wokman oa potas em oli bin bringim ol igo long Angau haus sik long Lae Lionel Agilo ibin wanpla man husat ibin kisim bikpla bagarap tru long wonem oli bin katim em long hed ol han na tupla lek blong en.Emi bin dai aste nait.Tupla narapla man ibin dai long tunde long wik igo pinis.Despla nius i kamap bihaen long ol polis long PNG ibin pulim kalabusim fopla man em oli sutim tok long ol olsem oli bin kamapim despla bikpla birua long Black cat Track.Polis Komisina Tom Kalunga oli bin pulim kalabusim tripla long Wau na narapla long Salamaua.Tokman blong United Nations insait long Papua New Guinea i askim gavaman long Port Moresby long lukluk ken long ol plen blong bringim bek capital punishment kilim man oa meri i kilim narapla.Tokman blong United Nations insait long Papua New Guinea i askim strong Gavman long Port Moresby long tingting ken long ol plen blong bringim bek loa blong kilim man oa meri husait i kilim narapla.Justice Minista blong PNG Kerengua Kua <NUM>.Dawn service ABC Licenced Joe Castro AAP Dawn service ibin stat long <NUM> na long dispela yar na ol yar igo pinis mo pipal i kam aut winim ol taim bipo.Long olgeta Australia kapital siti na planti longl taun long olgeta hap bilong kantri pipal igo bung pastaim long san kamap long tingim Anzacs.Sampela service i wanpela simpal bung bilong liklik namba bilong pipal na observing a minute silence.Planti tausen pipal i go bung long bikpela service namel long ol diginitaries na veterans.Chaplain or patel i save kondaktim mo eleborate services na ikam wantaim ol hymns readings pipers the laying of wreath na riffle volleys.The Last Post ABC Bethany Keats Long militeri tredisen the Last Post em bugle call i toksave long end bilong ol ektivitis bilong de.Long nau oli save harim long ol militeri fiunerals na memorial services na i makim duti bilong husat man na meri i serve na i taim i kamap long putim em i rest in peace.Oli save plein ol Last Post taim oli pinisim wanpela Dawn Service.Painimaut mo long history bilong Last Post wantaim tu ol toktok audio em yu ken harim long hia.Minute of silence Flickr CC PreciousBytes Oli holim One Minute of Silence bihianim Last Post.Emi minit bilong tingim bek na soim rispek na hamamas long ol man na meri ibin serve long militeri.Em i wanpela gutpela tingting na laik bilong Ancac Day <NUM> Returned and Services League RSL i salim re-recorded minute of silence.RSL em oganaisen i wok bilong sapotim ol dispela ibin served long Australian Defence Force.Mo long <NUM> servicemen na women wanpela i ken baim dispela <NUM> seconds of silence na harim long telepon we profits bilong em igo long ANZAC Appeal bilong RSL.ANZAC badges ABC Carmel O'Keeffe Narapela funresa bilong RSL long ANZAC Appeal em long salim ol badges.Long sampela wik long April ol badges i stap long ol RSL branches na ol stua.Oli ken lukim ol volentians i salim ol long ol soping senta spoting ivents na ol narapela bisi ples we pipal i igo ikam long en.Ol prais bilong ol badges i stat long tu igo nap long <NUM> na i based long Rising Sun emblem em planti Australians i save long en.Rosemary Flickr CC Luke Redmond Oli save werim Rosemary olgeta taim long ol lapels long Anzac Day olsem sain bilong remembrance.Dispela herb i save givim aut ol gutpela smel na oli bilip i gat samting insait long ol smel i halivim na improvim memori bilong pipal na oli save painim i gro wail antap long Gallipoli peninsula.Oli save givim aut ol liklik han bilong rosemary long ol Anzac Day services.Red poppies ABC Bethany Keats Oli save tok ol Red poppies i first plant long gro ken long ol graun oli pait long en long France na Belgium long First World War.Ol nau i kamap wanpela mak or symbol long remembrance.Ol i no save werim poppies antap long lapels long Anzac Day longwanem oli bilong Remembrance Day tasol.Ol Red Poppies i save kamap long Anzac Day long ol wreath or flawa oli save putim long ol memorials.Ol femali i save putim singal popies long sait bilong reletifs antap long rolls of honour.Gunfire breakfast Australian Defvcence Froce School of Catering i givim aut gunfire breakgast.Anzac Day <NUM> piksa CC Royal Australian Navy.Ol oganaisen na komuniti grup isave holim ol pablik brekfast oltaim bihain long dawn service wantaim ol sausages bacon na eggs long menu.Oli ken servin tu Tradtional Gunfire.em cup of coffee tea or milk wantaim rum.Gun Fire ibin British military term na i makim toktok long early cup of tea oli servim aut igo long ol soldia long moning.Anzac Day march Piksa bilong CC Barney Wrightson Long stat ol ibin holim Anzac Day march bilong ol olpela soldia husat ibin pait long World War wan trasol long ol taim ikam nau i bringim ol soldia husat ibin pait long ol wo em Australian ibin stap insait long en.Oli save holim ol march long ol siti na taun long olgeta hap bilong kantri na planti pipal isave igo long en.Long ol yar igo nau ol reletif bilong ol service man na meri i joinim na stap insait long kisim ples bilong femali memba ibin dai or i lapun tumas na ino no igo long ol march.Ol pipal i stap long mas i save praund long werim medals bilong ol long Anzac March.Ol dispela oli iusim ol medal i ken werim ol long left breast.Ol Riletif i werim ol medal lnog right breast.Bihain long mo ofisal hap bilong Anzac Day i ova planti ol soldia igo bung long reunions na catch up wantaim ol old mates oli pait or serve wantaim.Two-up Ol Australian soldia i pleim two-up long Afghanistan <NUM> ABC Licensed CPL Ricky Fuller Department of Defence Australian fevret tredisinal long Anzac Day em long plei two-up.Dsipela em i wanpela de tasol long yar oli ken pleim Australian game ligali autsait long ol ples i gat laisens.Dipsle game igo bek long <NUM> na ol Austrlaian soldia ibin pleim mo long taim bilong World War wan Wanpela Spiner em ol pipal i bung i makim i tromoi tupela koins or pennies igo antap na ol players iken gamble long hau oli bai pudaun.Two heads up i min Spinner win two tails min Spinner i lus wan wan long tupela Spinner i tromoi igo antap ken.Krismas bilong ol players i mas ova etin na wanem ol profits oli mekim i mas donet igo long charity.Anzac biscuits Piksa CC Amanda Slater Namba wan bisket oli ibin save olsem Anzac wafer or tile ibin wanpela hard biscuit oli bin save saplim igo long ami long World War wan em oli i bin save kaikai longwanem oli ibin misim bred.Oli wokim bilong em long i mas stap gut longpela taim so ino ibin gat egg long en.Sampela soldia ibin brukim ol igo liklik tru na kaikaim ol olsem ol porridge longwanem ol ibin strong tru.Mothers wives na girlfrieds rolled oats as a base.Other ingredients were sugar flour coconut butter golden syrup and bicarbonate of soda.Oli save mekim iet Anzac biskets tude long taim bilong Anzac Day na sampela organaisen bilong ol soldia i usim ol long raisim moni.Pilgrimages Young Australians at the Gallipoli Dawn Service <NUM> Flickr Department of Veterans Affairs Australia Long ol yar igo nau tasol em givim ol gutpla treining igo long ol despla ofisa blong oli ken mekim gut wok blong ol.Ol polis itok oli painim bodi blong wanpla dai man na moa long <NUM> kilogrem long drag kokein long wanpla bot bin wok long traem long bringim ikam insaet long Australia we oli bin laik salim long ol pipal.Ol Polis fosas blong Australia Tonga na Cook Islands wantem halvim ikam tu laen blong Drug Enforcement longwei tumas long Tonga wanpla mun bihaen long emi bin lus.Australian Customs Sevis itok oli bilip olsem ibin gat tupla bos kru insaet long despla bot taem emi bin lusim.Australian Federal Polis i salim pinis ol forensik saintis igo long Tonga long halvim wantem ol wok painimaut blong ol.Bai oli mekim tu ol wok painimaut long bodi blong despla daiman tasol bodi blong en ibin bagarap olgeta pinis.Ol polis long Tonga itok olsem mak blong despla kokein emi bin stap long bot sopos oli bin salim long ol pipal bai nap kamap long samting olsem <NUM> million.Julie Bishop bai go bek long ol askim sopos emi tru Australia isave mekim ol wok spai egensim Indonesia.Pasin em Australia na America i mekim long noken toktok long ol despla spai toktok despla i mekim Foran Minista blong Indonesia Marty Natalegawa long lukluk long stopim ol wokbung wantem Australia long daonim pasin blong bringim hait ol pipal oa pipal smuggling.Despla heve emi wok long kamap namel long Australia na do not intend to discuss intelligence matters in the media and it's a long-standing practice of Australian governments not to do so and I'll be adhering to that.Ms Bishop itok tu olsem emi no ting olsem igat bikpla heve istap namel long Indonesia na Australia na emi tok wokbung blong despla tupla kantri i wanpla bikpla samting.President Bambang Yudhoyono ibin statim despla Bali Democracy Forum Institute for Peace and Democracy emi stap long Bali isave mekim.Ol mansave blong Weather i bilip olsem <NUM> bikpla tropikal saiklon bai hamarim ol kantri blong South Pacific long despla Summer.Wanpla miting blong ol weather saintis blong Australia New Zealand America na ol ol kantri blong South Pacific ibin tokaut olsem planti moa tropikal saiklon bai stat long mun bihaen na bai pinis long mun April <NUM>.Press niuspepa blong New Zealand itok ol despla saiklon bai kamap long wonem strongpla kaen taem em oli kolim long La Nina phenomenon isave pushim ol hotpla solwara igo stret long Western Pacific.Despla La Nina isave bringim tu planti moa subtropical north-na northeasterly winds igo long New Zealand na despla isave mekim ol kaen kaen senis long weather na kamapim ol saiklon.New Zealand National Institute of Water Atmospheric Research Australia's Bureau of Meteorology na Pacific Islands national meteorological service ibin tokaut long despla twelv pla bikpla saiklon Oli tok ol kantri em oli stap long west blong international dateline olsem Papua New Guinea Solomon Islands Vanuatu New Caledonia na New Zealand i luk olsem bai oli kisim heve bihaenim ol tropikal saiklon.Hetman bilong Science dipatment long University of Papua New Guinea Dr Peter Petsul i tok gavman i larim planti ol gas ikam long LNG project i west nating.Dr Petsul itok PNG ken wokim planti samting wantaim dispela waste gas sapos gavman i bin lukluk gut long ol dispela samting pastaim long ol kampani olsem Exxon Mobil i ken kam insait.Em i tok gavman ino nid long baim ol bikpela generator long oveseas long wokim pawa emi tok dispela waste gas i wok long larem nating go long LNG gas project i ken inap long wokim pawa.Dispela LNG gas project i kamap long Papua New Guinea we oli salem namba wan gas pinis igo long Japan long sampla wik igo pinis_ emi wok long wastim planti gas.Dr Petsul itok sapos yu lukluk long nite long Napa Napa na Papa lealea long Mosbi na long Tari tu yu bai lukim olsem i bai gat bikpela fire i wok long go antap dispela emino fire em dispela waste gas we kantri ken iusim long wokim pawa na ol aropela samting UPNG School of Science i tok out olsem i gat planti ol aropela gas tu isave kam wantaim taim oli wok long digim dispela LNG gas tasol emi tok PNG gavaman ino lukluk hariap long usim dispela waste gas long mekim ol aropela samting olsem fertilizer na pawa.Dr Petsul itok gavman long taim belong toktok wantaim ol developer olsem Exxon Mobile bipo long developmebn i kamap oli no bin lukluk gut long ol aropela gas tu we bai em kam long PNG i stap insait long birua yet.Ol pastaim ripot ibin tok olsem ol Wambe haus lain ibin kilim dai sampela man meri na pikinini blong ol Kambia samting olsem tupela wik igo pinis.Wanpela skul go kemp aut long hap inap long wanpela wik pinis.Naba blong ol pipol husat ibin dai long dispela birua namel long ol Kambia na Wambe ino klia yet.Sampela ripot itok <NUM> pipol nau ibin dai sampela em i save bagarapim pikinini blong ol.Monica Richards husat i ranim hau blong ol meri oli kolim Haus Ruth long Port Moresby itok <NUM> per cent blong ol pikinini we i go long dispela haus i kisim bagarap wantaim ol mama blong ol.Em itok planti man i save paitim pikinini blong ol tu taim oli paitim meri blong ol.Bikpla askim nau i wok long kamap sapos ol tokples blong Papua New Guinea bai stap Guinea ibin save olsem emi no gat ol gutpla loa istap long lukautim ol asylum seeka tasol emi bin go hed na sainim despla tok oraet wantem Australia.Managing Direkta blong Papua New Guinea Investment skul.Despla loa blong skul i karamapim tu ol narapla samting olsem kemera laptop na musik playa.Interim President blong Vanuatu Ratu Epeli Nailatikau i stap nao long Port Vila insait long wanpla Melanesian Spearhead Grup.Em igo pinis long Solomon Islands na bihainim displa trip igo long Vanuatu em bai flai igo long papua New Guinea.Port Vila niusman Hilaire Bule i tok displa lukluk igo long ol Solomon Islands Vanuatu na Papua New Guinea i blong pulim sapot blong ol insait long ol wok kamap blong Fiji na wok reri igo long nupla Konstitusin na bikpla ileksin blong kantri long yar bihain.Insait long ol toktok bung wantaim Gavman blong Vanuatu ol askim na toktok i kamap ken long bikpla wari blong ol Ni-vanuatu pipol husait ibin igo long Fiji long wok long ol suka plentesin long taim bipo.Displa singaut na toktok ibin kam long ol Vaturisu Council of Chiefs blong Efate.Solomon Islands Praim Minista Gordon Darcy Lilo i bin mekim dispela ol wari blongen taim em i toktok long UN General Assembly long tok ol bikpela na rich kantri imas mekim moa long takolim ol heve na bagarap blong climate change.Mr Lilo ibin tok em i joinim ol arapela ol liklik aelan kantri long autim dispela wari olsem climate change i wanpela traipela wari blong ol kantri na ol pipol blongen.Solomon Islands is deeply troubled by the current low ambition level pledged by developed countries em i bin tok.There is a discrepancy between what has been pledged and what is necessary to stabilise temperature increase.Mr Lilo tu i tokim assembly olsem wok blong ol meri long sosaiti i bikpela tru long Praim Minista.Long Fonde apinun Mr Namah ibin igo het bihainim ol tok lukaut bilong em.Sir Salamo bilip olsem ol eksan bilong Mr Namah long mekim polis i arestim em i soim olsem polis i no indipendent na ol i no bihainim koman bilong polis komisian tasol i stap aninit long koman bilong deputi praim minista.Autsait long kot Mr Namah i tok dispela ol eksan bilong em i soim olsem wankain ol pasin olsem bai kamap long kantri bihain ino tru.Em ibin tok em i givim Sif Jastis <NUM> haus.Taim i ran aut pinis.Narapela Surpim Kot Jas Nicholas Kiriwom ibin stap tu long kothause na i tok em i painim ibin tok ol bai sanap na pait bilong lukautim mama lo bilong kantri.Australia wari Praim Minista bilong Austraia Julia Gillard i tok em i bin toktok pinis wantaim Mr O'Neil na tokaut long wari bilong em long ol niupela divelopment.Mausman bilong Ms Gillard i tok Mr O'Neil ibin tok orait olsem emi impotent long lukim olsem dispela niupela divelopment ino givim heve igo long gutpela progres oli ibin mekim igo het long eleksan dispela yar.Foran Minista Bob Carr ibin toktok tu wantaim PNG Gavman na mekim strongpela askim long ino ken kisim wanem kain eksan agensim Sir Salamo.Em i tok PNG gavman i oli isuim pinis ol writs na makim de bilong vot.Eleksan em i samting i mo impoten eleksan i soim trupela samting na otoriti bilong gavman.Ol pipol raun long kantri i bung long makim Australia Day.Ol pipol raun long kantri na raun long wol i bung long makim Australia Day.Dispela ol selebreisin ibin kik-stat long monin wantaim Australia Day Honours List wea ol i givim bikpla luksave na awod igo long ol Australia pipol husait i mekim bikpla sanis long laif long ol arapla pipol.Displa yar awod igo long ol bik-laen wantaim tu wanpla speech pathologist conservationists na sainits wantaim tu wantem ol ofisa blong Australian Customs Australian Federal Police AFP Queensland Police Papua New Guinea Customs PNG Immigration na PNG Police.Despla vilis istap long Western or Fly River Province na olsem wanpla dei tasol pastem long despla wok patrol ibin kamap long Sigabaduru emi bin bungim wanpla man blong despla ples nem blong en Nope Nama husat ibin go long narapla ailan blong Australia em oli kolim Duan we emi bin baem sampla samting long stua long hap.Despla man ibin baem ol samting olsem rice flour sugar na loli wara na emi bin go bek long bikples PNG long avinun.As tingting blong ol rural eria long kisim malolo long taem blong krismas.Samting olsem <NUM> ol pipal ibin kisim despla sik dengi fiva stat iet long mun Novemba long <NUM>.Binatang blong Dengi Fiva em oli save lukim ol pipal ino save gut long en.Dr Nilles itok tu olsem What this means is that a large proportion of the population is susceptible to this type of infection.It means that there is the potential for larger and more explosive outbreaks than if it is one of the types that have been circulating for some time.Dr Nilles itok Dengi Fiva i wanpla kaen sik emi nap kamapim bikpla heve long laif na helt bilong Australia i senisim wei em i save lukautim ol aid ovasis.Foran Minista Julie Bishop i tokaut long nait igo pinis olsem aid wok bilong Australia bai kamap olsem perfomance-based na dispela bai halavim ol pipol bilong komuniti insait long East Sepik Provins bilong PNG bilong gutpela wara saplai na wokim ol gutpela toilet.Bigpela tingting bihain longen i bilong kamapim senis long ol senis lain bilongen isave raun long olgeta wanwan village bilong halavim na skulim ol pipol.Em wanpela Internation organisation na ol igat ofis bilong ol tu insait long Wewak.Norma Sagom i tok klia liklik long ol wok lain bilongen iwok long wokim.Ol laspela soldia blong Papua New Guinea husat i wokim sekiuriti anianit long Regional Assistance Mission i lusim nau Solomon Islands.Ol soldia blong PNG ibin wok wantaim ol arapela blong Australia New Zealand na Tonga long RAMSI insait long ten pela yar igo pinis.Wayne Higgins em special coordinator blong Ramsi i tokim Pacific Beat blong Radio Australia olsem dispela Melanesian connection na Tok Pisin em i impotan tumas long wok blong Ramsi.Em itok kain wei ol soldia blong PNG i save harim toktok blong ol Solomon Islands na save long Melanesian pasin em i gutpela long wok blong Ramsi.Ol laspela soldia blong PNG oli tok gutbae long ol long wanpela semoni long Honiara na bai wanpela grup blong Tonga nau i kisim ples blong ol.Mr Higgins itok dispela nau bai laspela long ol troop blong PNG bai go aninit long Ramsi.Em itok nau bai ol police tasol i lukautim long sait long sekiuriti na ol military bai lusim kantri long namel long dispela yar.Ol development progrsam blong RAMSI bai gohet aninit long bilateral na ol arapela donor program igo long Solomon Islands.Planti long ol wok blong Ramsi bai gohet aninit long narapela nem na ol polis tasol bai stap aninit long Ramsi.Johnson Honimae Pablic Affairs Officer wantaim RAMSI i tok wanpela senia ofisa blong PNG Defence Force ibin stap taim ol laspela sikstin soldia blong PNG i oli tok gutbae long ol long aste.PNG NGO grup Melanesian Solidarity itok Australia inogat respek tru long Papua New Guinea olsem wanpela independent kantri taim emi tromoi ol West Papua refugee long Port Moresby ples balus.Australia ino gat respek tru long Papua New Guinea olsem wanpla indipendan kantri.Laen blong Melanesian Solidarity em i save sapotim ol West Papua pipal i mekim despla toktok bihaen long Australia i bin iusim wanpla balus long bringim sevenpla West Papua pipal igo long Port Moresby long wik igo pinis.Ol despla pipal ibin laik kam na stap long Australia olsem ol refugee tasol Australia ibin hariap tru na bringim ol igo long PNG na nau oli stap long wanpla Hotel long Port Moresby.Melanesian Solidarity itok tu olsem PNG imigreisan dipatman itokim ol despla pipal olsem bai oli salim ol igo bek long Papua.Tony Fofoe itokim Radio Australia oli warii stret long despla na bai oli soim tingting nolaik blong ol long wanpla protes mas igo long Australian Hai komisin na PNG imigreisan ofis long Fraide.Koros blong ol ibin kamap bihain long ol dispela West Papua pipol ibin kam kamap long Port Moresby ples balus na oli nogat ples long stap.Ol offisel blong PNG imigreisen department ibin go kisim ol na askim sapos oli gat sampela kain travel pepa oa document tasol oli tok oli nogat.Narapela koros blong Melanesian Solidority em long Australia husait ibin bringim ol colony blong em.Tasol sampela komuniti lida long Port Moresby city itok dispela tambu i stat long kamapim wari long sampela pipol em oli save strong long moni oli kisim longen long lukautim sidaun blong mun Oktoba Port Moresby city i luk klin tru.Tasol sampela komuniti lida long Port Moresby city itok dispela tambu i stat long kamapim wari long sampela pipol em oli save strong long moni oli ol bikpla taon.In this modern day and age we don't expect people to take three days to get help for a person who's got emotional distress who's suicidal.They should be available in eveyr primary care clinic like you know when you get a headache when you get a stomach ache you can go anywhere and get treatment there'll be some primary care worker but not mental health.Kevin Rudd na Tony Abbott i tok long insait long wanpela press conference itokaut long ileksen de.A choice between a new way for the future with positive plans for managing the new economic challenges we face as opposed to the long palaman.Palaman bai bung insaet long tupla wik.Paliment memba blong Manus Island Ronnie Knight i tok planti wok istap tasol Australia atoriti i pasim ai long givim wok igo long ol lokol blongen na ino em tasol.Nao iet ABC i ripot olsem Australia kampani i lukautim narapla kontrak em long lokol rabis damp ol i pasim.Rabis i pulap nating long graun rabis i sting na pulap long blue flies long Los Negros aelan bikos long displa rabis tip.Ol atoriti long Fiji i istat nau long putim bek ol sevis olsem pawa na wara saplai igo long ol eria em Saiklon Evan i bagarapim.Ol pipal blong moa.Long askim blong PNG bai kisim ol refugi em oli kam long Australia Sir Paulias ino sapotim tru dispela tingting.Wanpla sumatin blong Sandaon provins long Papua New Guinea i mekim pinis bikpla long Seventh Day Adventist College long East New Britain province.Oposisn Lida blong Papua New Guinea Dame Carol Kidu i lusim wok politik long tok ol imas tingim em olsem wanpela maus-meri oa policy ileksin blong mun bihain bai givim sans long nupela sanis long kantri.The political impasse of the past nine months has been a trying time for all but we must thank the people of Papua New Guinea for Sea Minining long New Guinea Islands i tingting long igo bek long Madang.MP blong Sumkar long Madang Ken Fairweather i agensim tru dispela plan.Polis blong Papua New Guinea nau i arrrestim pinis blong tripela kago boi idai na sampela blong ol wantaim nainpela trekas blong narapela kantri ibin kisim bagarap long bodi blong ol.Mr Lamei itok narapela tripela wantaim tu tupela brata iwok long Diwai Biawen na Banis Donkey.Emi tok ol pipol blong ples long Morobe ibin halivim polis wantaim ol gutpela toksave we ibin halivim polis long arrestim narapela tupela moa saspek.Mr Lamei itok emi olgeta ibin stap insait long dispela atek.Polis helikopta Eye in the Sky ibin halivim Mr Lamei na ol offisa blong em stat long taim dispela birua ibin kamap long painim ol dispela saspek wantaim tu bringim ol saspek long ples blong ol igo long polis sel.Dispela polis helikopta bai igo hed long halivim polis long sait blong transport long taim dispela wok painim istap yet.Long wankain taim learned that that's not the case and several of them have taken the decision to return back to their country of origin.Despite a global effort to fight malaria which has saved more than three million lives in the past tetin years WHO says hundreds of thousands are still dying needlessly.Health authorities estimate that the global fight against malaria has saved more than three million lives in the past tetin years but say the disease is still a threat in South-East Asia and Africa.In its latest report the World Health Organisation says that despite the improvement the mosquito-borne disease still killed more than <NUM> people last year mainly children in Africa.WHO's Malaria Report <NUM> says a shortage of funding and basic remedies like bed nets mean that malaria is still a major threat.The fact that so many people are infected and dying from mosquito bites is one of the greatest tragedies of the <NUM> century the organisation's director-general Margaret Chan said.The WHO report says a surge in global funding has meant great strides have been made in tackling the disease in the past decade.But it says even though <NUM> billion was spent on the problem last year the funds are still only half what is needed to make sure everyone at risk of malaria has access to interventions.This remarkable progress is no cause for complacency absolute numbers of malaria cases and deaths are not going down as fast as they could Dr Chan said.In <NUM> there were an estimated <NUM> million cases of malaria causing some <NUM> deaths.The Democratic Republic of Congo and Nigeria are the hardest-hit among about ten countries where malaria is a leading killer.Regional tally of malaria deaths In the Pacific the most deaths from malaria in <NUM> were recorded in Papua New Guinea where <NUM> died followed by Solomon Islands with etin deaths.Elsewhere in the region Cambodia recorded <NUM> deaths Thailand recorded <NUM> Laos <NUM> the Philippines sikstin China fotin and Malaysia twelv.Topping the list for the region was India with <NUM> deaths Myanmar with <NUM> and Indonesia with <NUM>.An estimated <NUM> billion people are at risk of malaria worldwide with <NUM> per cent of cases occurring in Africa.The report says there has been tangible progress in more than half of the <NUM> countries with ongoing malaria transmission where the incidence rate has decreased since <NUM>.Death rates worldwide fell by <NUM> per cent between <NUM> and <NUM> in all age groups and by <NUM> per cent in children under five.The main interventions for malaria are indoor spraying diagnostic testing artemisinin-based combination drug therapies and bed nets treated with insecticides.However in <NUM> countries malaria parasites are showing signs of resistance to insecticides.Another main concern is the emerging resistance to the core component of anti-malarial medicines artemisinin in Thailand Vietnam Myanmar and Cambodia.Countries are ignoring drug resistance measures But the report says that despite a WHO recommendation that pills with only artemisinin are removed from the market in favour of combination therapies to better protect against emerging resistance nine countries six of them in Africa continue to make these drugs available.Overall access to combination drug therapies rose with <NUM> million courses delivered in <NUM> up from <NUM> million in <NUM>.The report also raised concerns that international efforts to expand interventions to control mosquitoes had slowed down for the second successive year particularly the distribution of bed nets.We went from a peak of more than <NUM> million nets distributed in <NUM> to much lower numbers in <NUM> and <NUM> said Robert Newman head of the WHO's Global Malaria Program.We know that these are lifesaving tools he said noting that a net costing about twelv can last three years.AFP.Gavman blong Papua New Guinea i tok em bai galasim wanpela petisin blong ol kamapim dispela tingting bihainim dispela moni wari em ol kantri blong wol iwok long bungim nau.Ol bos blong British ami nau i rausim tingting blong kisim ol soldia blong narapela kantri na lukluk tasol nau long kisim ol yangpela blong ol yet long wanem long dispela bikpela wari long ol wok moni.Namba blong ol yangpela blong ol yet em nau igo joinim ami igo antap pinis long wan tausen stat long las yar na dispela tingting blong kisim ol soldia blong ol arapela Commonwealth kantri nau oli lukim olsem ino bikpela tingting blong nau.Wanpela bikpela offisel blong Ministri blong Defens ibin tokim the mail wanpela nius pepa blong Britain olsem kisim ol soldia blong Pacific Islands i wanpela wei long pulumap ol gap taim oli sot long ol yangpela blong ol yet Igat nau <NUM> ol soldia blong Commonwealth na <NUM> em ol soldia blong ol arapela kantri nau istap long ami blong Britain klostu seventin pesen long ol man power blong em.Laen blong International Office of Migration i mekim despla toktok long wanpla ripot blong en.Wanpla Human rights activist na lida meri long Papua New Guinea i mekim bikpla askim igo long ol meri long respektim ol iet na noken harim toktok blong ol narapla long salim ol iet long ol man.Mrs Helen Hakena direkta blong Leitana Nehan Divelopman agensi long Bougainville i mekim despla toktok bihaenim wanpla ripot blong International Office of Migration.Despla ripot itok olsem Papua New Guinea nau igat wari blong fosim ol meri long maritim ol man em oli no laikim na tu sampla isave wok olsem ol pamuk.Sampla taem oli save kisim ol meri blong ol narapla provins na fosim ol long wok long ol narapla provins olsem ol haus meri.Mrs Hakena itok olsem nau ol mobile phone isave halvim ol man long giamanim ol meri.Emi tok tu olsem emi sore long lukim planti kandre brata isave salim ol susa na kandre meri blong ol igo long ol narapla man blong kisim moni.Wankaen pasin isave kamap tu wantem ol man blong ol meri husat isave fosim ol meri blong ol long slip wantem ol narapla man long kisim moni.Lain Oxfam na Greenpeace ibin putim aut las tingting blong ol long mekim Pacific Islands Forum long kamapim strongpela tingting long Climate Change.Jemima Garrett ibin tok dispela tupela grup ibin putim tingting blong tupela insait long wanpela bung long Sydney aste nait.Toktok blong ol bai lukim ol komuniti lida blong ol kantri olsem long wik.Moa asailam sika bai igo long dispela wik na ol i bilip bai ol i kisim ol meri na pikinini dispela taim tu.Foren Minista blong Nauru Kieran Keke i tok Nauru i bin wanbel long lukautim olgeta long Gavman blong John Howard taim ol i salim ol asailam sika igo stap long aelan blongen.It certainly was almost like having two entities operating in the same land and that didn't fit that well with na rausim ol kaving long palamen haus.Dr Martin Fowler itok palamen haus long Port Moresby em i wanpela nasenal treasure blong PNG na em i kirap nogut tru long sampela lain i bagarapim long dispela kain pasin.Em itok sapos man i gat respek long kalsa na pipol blong Papua New Guinea em bai nonap bagarapin ol dispela art long kalsa blong kantri.Dr Fowler i tokim Helen Sapien blong NBC olsem long University long igo het bilong ol long dispela niupela taim i stat long tingim bek long ples na pasin tumbuna na kalsa bilong ol.Em i tok i gat tingting nau i wok long senis olsem ol i ken holim ol niupela na tumbuna kalsa.Praim Minista Julia Gillard i tokaut olsem federal ileksen blong dispela yar bai kamap long Septemba fotin.Bihainim blog blong mipela long harim toktok blong em.Long toktok number of ileven on the night shift for example is reduced by the number of people who might be off work for any number of reasons em itok.The issue is that if you have inadequate staffing levels in provins.Planti pipal tu ibin kam long bikples PNG na planti long ol despla pasinjia em ol sumatin husat ibin wok long laik go long ol bikpla skul long mainland PNG.Tommy Yep husat i wanpla skul tisa na tu emi siaman blong Rabaul Queen disaster committee itok emi klostu wanpla yia na sikispla mun bihaen long despla birua na sampla klostu i lus tingting long en.Tasol emi tok maski emi longpla taem liklik oli hamamas long lukim olsem sampla gutpla samting i kamap na ol femili iken stap isi liklik.Sasindra Muthuvel Gavana bilong West New Britain Provins long Papua New Guinea i tok i gat planti liklik bisnis we ol pipal bilong narapela kantri i papa long ol na isi long ol i karim ol samting igo insait long kantri.Emi tok em i no kirap nogut long save olsem sampela long ol i nap bringim hait
