bai givim birua igo long ol enimal na plant bilong kantri.Tu Gavana Sasindran i tok em i laik lukim ol ovasis bisnisman ino ken kisim na lukautim ol smol bisnis em ol Papua New Guineans iet i mas papa long ol.Gavana bilong West New Britain Province Sasindra Muthuvel i tok <NUM> pesent bilong ol smol bisnis i stap long han bilong ol pipal bilong narapela kantri na oli no gat dreka kontrol long blong Immigration ino bin laik givim hamas long dispela ol pipol i bin traim kamapim bagarap long ol iet.Louise Newman wanpela professor of developmental psychiatry long Monash University na foma self-harm as some people might think.It's not superficial harm in a way designed to attract attention.This is actually people engaging in very serious suicidal behaviour Prof Newman i tok.Self-harm is often motivated by several things at once.It can be a sign of distress and stress.Clearly it can also be the wish that an outcome could be different and I think what is so disturbing about this happening on Nauru so soon is that people are clearly aware that sadly they could be held there for prolonged eriods of time.Wanpela statement blong ol asailam sika long Nauru i tok We also request long kisim ten long wan hau oli no ken paim takis mum's is the work Mr Scheelings i tok.Gavman i ting intrest bilong progembai go antap Emmanuel Bani givim wok long ol sisinel wokas long pikim fruit na vegetable.Em i tok emi save long sampela famas long Queensland i emploim ol wokas long ekspaia turist visa.Emi tok i hat tru long ol long kompit agensim taim ol fama i kisim ol illegal workers long hap na andapeim ol klostu nain long wan haua long olgeta fam.Mr Bani long planti taim ol employas ino nap painim ol wokas tai taim bilong havestim ol krop bilong ol.Em i tok ol ino save i gat ol wokas long fam bilong ol taim oli laikim ol na long dispela tasol oli lusim ol krops bilong ol.PNG Institute of National afeas itok Task Fos Swip imas wok em iet sopos emi laik stopim korapsan tru tru long samting blong fait long ailan.Despla loa istap insaet long ol tok oraet oa Bougainville Peace agreement em Papua New Guinea gavman na United Nations ibin kamapim sampla yia igo pinis.Despla tok oraet heve olsem obesety oa oli fat tumas sopos oli ken stop long baem lamb flaps na baem nupla kaen mit olgeta mit blong Kanagroo.Despla toktok ikam long Kangaroo Industry Association blong Australia husat tu per cent fat half of the fat that is there is polyunsaturated so it's good or youy anyway and it's also been shown to be high in a compound called conjugated linoleic acid which does a whole lot of kisim na lukautim despla kampani.Laen blong Papua New Guinea Sustainable Development Program PNGSDP i tok lukaut olsem emi nap kisim gavman igo long kot bihaenim tingting blong Mr O'Neill long kisim na lukautim despla kampani.Long wik igo pinis Praim Minista O'Neill ibin tokim EMTV nius long Port Moresby olsem em bai bringim wanpla tingting blong en igo long palaman long despla wik blong kisim na long mekim ol pipal i wari na poret nating.Mr O'Neill itok emi no tru olsem gavman blong en i laik kisim na lukautim OK Tedi.Ol laen igo pas long Papua New Guinea Sustainable Development Program pinis ol memba kantri blong UN General Assembly long wok had nau long daonim wari blong climate change.Taem oli bin wok long givim toktok blong en long United Nations General Assembly ol President blong Marshall Islands Kiribati na Palau ibin askim long oli mas kisim planti moa halvim long daonim wari blong ol solwara iwok long go antap na bagarapim ol kantri blong ol.Tommy Remengesau President blong Palau ibin tokim Asembli olsem kantri blong en bai bagarap sopos oli no kisim halvim long daonim wari blong sea level rise oa ol solwara iwok long go antap.President Remengesau itok olsem Our global warming doomsday is already set in stone if we fail to act.It is therefore our job as leaders to take all necessary actions to eliminate the current threat.My country along with other Pacific Island countries is unwilling to even discuss a three degrees to five degrees temperature increase scenario by the end of the Century for this will ensure our demise.We are also unwilling to discuss the issue of migration.Mr Remengesau imekim tu despla toktok Instead we will continue to work with our developed partners to implement strong mitigation commitments and follow-through actions to hold the line on this increase to the more realistic <NUM> degree level.Mr Remengau ibin tokim General Asembli olsem ol wok blong daonim wari blong climate change i slo tumas na ol bikpla kantri i luk olsem oli no wari tumas long ol kaen heve em ol liklik kantri isave bungim nau long climate change.Today it appears that the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change has stalled that the Kyoto Protocol is on life support and that the Rio twenti Conference has not done enough to strengthen our three pillars of sustainable development.Our job as leaders is to re-invigorate our efforts by establishing real mitigation commitments and in identifying immediate sufficient and long-term implementation financing.It is clear that what is needed today is leadership leadership from the developed world and leadership from the developing world leadership that focuses beyond borders and looks past today's problems.In the end leadership that creates a broad consensus vision to preserve our planet for tomorrow's children.Marshall Islands istat pinis long kisim taem long climate change President blong Marshall Islands Christopher Loeak ibin tokim General Assembly olsem emi taem nau blong United Nations long mekim ol wok long daonim wari blong climate change na emi no ken toktok nating.Mr Loeak itok olsem Simply repeating well-worn negotiation slogans will get the world nowhere.It is time for new solutions.I strongly urge my fellow leaders to engage eye to eye at the Secretary-General's climate summit next year never has the need been so dire for true statesmanship.Mr Loeak i bilip olsem ol kantri long wold ino gat bikpla laik long stretim na helpim long daonim despla kaen wari em ol Pacific kantri iwok long bungim nau long climate change.Low-lying island nations such as mine are already paying the earliest costs of what is fast becoming a global crisis.In every sense the world must build for future risks and too often we are still setting course for current conditions.It is the seas that are rising not the islands that are sinking.President Loeak ibin tok tu Genral asembi olsem ol bikpla kantri em oli save pamim ol pipia nogut igo long kilaut oa envairaman imas lukluk na bihaenim pasin em ol liklik ailan kantri long Pacific iwok long mekim nau bong daonim despla wari.Emi tok The Marshall Islands is well on track to achieve complete solarisation of our outer islands a goal we are meeting with the assistance from Japan's Pacific Environment Community funds as well as assistance from the European Union Taiwan Italy France and other donor partners.The entire region is also aggressively cutting our own emissions through a Pacific New Energy Drive and the message for our partners the world's largest emitters is clear if we can do it so can you.Bikpla wok na wari tru long despla taem President blong Kiribati Anote Tong itok olgeta kantri long wold imas wok had nau long lukautim despla ples blong ol pipal blong bihaen taem.Mr Tong itok olsem I frequently find myself watching my grandchildren and wondering what sort of a future we are leaving them.For their sake climate change is an issue that I will continue to talk about for as long as I have breath in my body.This is a critical issue for the survival of our people and for all of humanity.It remains the greatest moral challenge of our time In <NUM> leaders gathered at the Earth Summit in Rio de Janeiro to discuss ways to tackle climate change and protect the environment.Mr Tong i tokim Asmebi olsem tupla ten yia bihaenim despla bikpla miting long Rio de Janeiro tasol oli no tok oli mas mekim samting long en oa long oli sapotim.Mr Rudd i tok em i bin save yet wok blong pulim tingting bong ol lida long sapotim aidia blong em long kirapim wanpla Asia-Pacific komuniti pastem long yia <NUM> bai kisim sampla yia.Em i tok em i amamas long kain sapot em i kisim nau long ol arapla APEC lida.Wanpela sinia expert long wok development blong Australia i tok aid pinis.Dispela ol toktok ibin kam long Professor Helen Hughes blong Centre for Independent Studies insait long Sydney.Em i tok Gavman blong Australia i save pasim ai long ol gavman korapsim we em i kamapim moa poverty insait long Pacific.They have ripped off whatever aid or tourism or minerals have been developed for a very small elite you know these are our neighbours we've betrayed them em South-East Asia na Australia long mun bihaen.Asistant sekreteri blong Steit blong East Asia na Pacific Kurt Campbell itok America i bilip olsem despla roket bom em North Korea ilaik sut long en bai pudaon long sampla hap namel long Australia Indonesia na Philippines.Ol narapla roket bom em North Korean ibin lonsim bifo ibin go olsem long Japan.Aste Fairfax nius ibin ripot olsem Mr Campbell ibin givim despla tok lukaut igo stret long Australian foran minista Bob Carr.Mr Campbell ibin tok olsem oli no bin lukim despla kaen pasin bifo.Emi bin tok tu olsem America itoktok pinis wantem despla stap isi long despla taem we North Korea iwok long redi long lonsip roket bom blong en.Sampla bosman bifo blong Papua New Guinea difens fos i sutim long Australia olsem emi asua long ol wari blong fos em aninit long en ibin gat wok blong pinisim na bringim ol soljia igo bek long ol ples blong ol.General Singirok itok pasin em ol soljia ibin mekim egensim ol medikal sumatin long wikend emi bin bilong Australia ibin painim na holim pasim ol bot i karim <NUM> asylum seeker.Paliment blong Papua New Guinea i usim nupela loa em i wok long pulim planti toktok kros long suspendim tupela top jas na oli no wanbel tru.Solomon Islands i putim tambu nau long pipol i salim sigarett na smuk long ol pablik plesi hap blong nupela strongpela loa igo wantaim Wol nogat Tobacco Dei.Smuk long sampela ol blong Australia em ol soljia blong Germany ibin kilim ol long Bitapaka.Long wik bihaen sampla Australian navi ofisa wantem tu sampla Australian gavman ofisa bai joinim ol pipal blong Rabaul long makim work he said.We would just like to see there is more cooperation between us involved in that.Win blong Tony Abbot na Coalition laen blong en long Australia ileksan long Sarere imekim wanpla politikal Australia.Wari blong ol wok long ditensan senta ibin kamap tu long Manufacturing council blong PNG husat igat wankaen belheve olsem ol Manus pipal.Chey Schovell emi chif executive ofisa blong council June dispela yar.Dr Joseph Ketan wanpela visiting Fellow long Institute for PNG Studies ibin wanpela observer long Jiwaka long taim blognen ileksin.Em i tok olsem ileksin ibin ron gut nogat trabol tasol ino bin free na fair.There was a lot of intimidation there was a lot of corrective coerced voting the secret ballot principle was compromised.This in turn disenfranchised a lot of women there was a lot of under-age voting the common roll was discarded about ten twenti minutes into the polling.Dr Ketan i tok bai ol ino save long risalt nau bikos ol i kukim olgeta vot.Moa long wan tausan blong lukaitim peles.Mr Pita itok wok blong daunim ol heve we i kamap long Climate Change imas stat wantaim ol indigenous komuniti na ol otiriti i mas involvim ol.Ol Mr Pita itok ol grup blongen ibin blong Marshall Islands long wik igo pinis.Climate change ibin wanpla long ol bikpla toktok em ol lida ibin lukluk long en.Oli bin tok tu olsem iluk olsem despla wari ino stap moa olsem bikpla samting high-level political oversight and management of the strategic direction of our relationship Ms Gillard i tok.Wanpela jadge blong Papua New Guinea i karim aut ol wok painim long sait blong human rait ibin kisim bagarap.Em nau igo lukluk long dispela senta na itok namba wan samting em ibin lukim em bikpela namba blong ol sekuriti offisa kamap na soim pes blong ol.Em i tok long lukluk blong en ol wokman na meri imas stretim gut ol samting long sotpela taim long ol exercise na ol dormitories blong ol asailam sika Emi tok em ino toktok wantaim sampela blong ol asailam sika tasol itok oli bin stretim gut na ol asailam sika yet i luk gut nogat sik na tu oli no luk angere.Narapela samting emi tok em ol asailam sika lukim orait kaikai gut na oli dress gut.Australia Difens Fos i stopim pastaim bihainim rot igo long Isurava Memorial.Pait namel long pipol blong sampela provins i lukim tripela pipol i dai na planti haus oli bagarapim long Lae long Morobe Provins.Dispela pait ibin kamap namel commitments at face value em i tok.But it's obviously very important that the elections do happen in accordance with the PNG consitution and that means happening on time.Trade Union Congress blong Papua New Guinea i laik long ol gavman kampani na olgeta employa long kantri imas peim ol woka blong ol niupela legal minimum wage blong kantri.President blong Papua New Guinea Trade Union Congress imas behainim dispela loa blong gavman na peim ol wok lain blong ol long dispela nupela pei reit we i stat long <NUM> long wanwan aoa blong wok.Emi tok bikpela wok i stap wantaim dipatmen of leba long niupela rate we i noken go tablo long <NUM> long wanwan aoa.Teknikel skul long Geelong i iusim kofi blong Tanna Island long Vanuatu long trainin blong em.Kofi blong Tanna island long Vanuatu igo pas blong Tanna we emi gutpela tru long wanem igat wanpela gutpela stori ikam wantaim em.Long toktok blong en wantaim Bethany Keats Rowan Sapwell itok bikpela samting em oli laik lukluk long ol narakain blong ol.Emi tok emi kamap olsem popular kofi we igat tu gutpela stori ikam wantaim dispela kofi blong Tanna.Papua New Guinea igat strongpla wokbung wantem Japan long ol wok bisnis na tu Japan igat na ino at heve longen.Displa boda mak na rijon i stap stret long Jayapura na Vanimo.Benny Popoitai Deputi Gavana blong papua New Guinea i tok tupla samting i save kamap long boda blong tupla long boda em ibin tok.The Greens Party i tok Australian gavman i mas usim Pacific Islands Forum bilong tokaut stret long funding bilong em igo long Office bilong Chief Trade Advisor na ino ken gat ol narapela tripela yar ikam.Maus-meri bilong Greens long ol overseas aid Lee Rhiannon itok dispela i brukim tokaut bilong gavman olsem funding bilong en bai ino ken igo wantaim ol tingting na laik bilong em long hau Chief Trade Advisor ofis bai wok.Foran Minista blong Australia Bob Carr na US Secretary blong State John Kerry i toktok long hau bai tupela inkrisim wokbung long Asia-Pacific long memba blongen long UN Security Council long dil wantaim Syria na North Korea.Mr Kerr itok em i ting memba blong Australia long Council em bai mekim ol wokbung long dil wantaim ol isiu long wol wantaim Syria na Middle East peace process na North Korea bai hohet gutpela moa.Long wantain taim tu Senator Carr i rausim wanpela askim long sapot blongen long Prime Minister Julia Gillard long wanpela nius conference long United States.Senator Carr i rausim ol nius ripot olsem em inomoa sapotim Prime Minister Julia Gillard na itok olsem Prime Minister igat sapot blongen.Em i tokim ol niuspipol olsem bai gutpela moa sapos oli tokim em pastaim bipo oli raitim kain ripot olsem.Em itok ol ripot long Fairfax ino tru na oli no bin painim toktok long ofis blongen long dispela.Oli surikim igo bek long sikpela mun wanpela laik bilong Free West Paua movment long joinim Melanesian Spearhead Group.Melanesian Spearhead Group i bringim wantaim ol lida bilong Fiji Papua New Guinea Solomon Islands na Vanuatu wantaim tu ol as ples pipal bilong New Caledonia politikal movement FLKS.Free West Papua movement i laik kisim indipendens lusim Indonesia na i lukim kamap memba bilong MSG i wanpela step igo het long oli luksave long en long ol narapela hap bilong wold.PacNews i ripot olsem ol foren minista i go bung long Lifou kapital bilong Loyalty Islands bilong New Caledonia ibin pasim tingting long surukim disisen igo nap long wnapela ministiral misin igo bek bihain long visitim Jakarta na Yayapura.Foran Minista bilong fiji Raut Inoke Kabuabola ibin tokim miting olsem Indonesia i bin putim aut dispela invetesen long stat bilong dispela mun.Em i tok Fiji Papua New Guinea na Solomon Islands i kisim sem posisen taim em i kamap dispela Indonesian provins bilong Papua.Em i bin tok olgeta MSG kantri i gat wankin tingting olsem oli laikim sampela kain bilong self-gavman bilong West Papua.Foran Minista bilong Vanuatu Edward Natapei i tok kantri bilong em i givim strongpela halivim long indipendens tasol planti namba ibin winim em.Em i tok oli mas bihainim tingting bilong planti pipal.Edward Natapei i tok emi laikim oli putim taim olsem oli ken save oli ken dil wantaim dispela iusi insait long dispela yar.Mr Natapei i tok praim minista bilong Vanuatu bai autim dispela ius wantaim ol narapela lida long ritrit i stat long Fonde.Ol ting ol lida bai givim tok orait long husat bai i stap long lain oli salim igo long Jakarta na Yayapura.Ol Pacific lida imas stop long toktok nating long Climate change na mekim ol trupla wok blong helpim ol communiti blong ol em oli bungim heve long rising sea levelsDespla toktok i kamap long wan kaen em bikpla miting blong Pacific Islands Forum iwok long go hed long Majuro biktaon blong Marshall Islands.Climate Change emi wanpla long ol bikpla toktok em ol despla lida itoktok long en long miting blong ol.Pastem PNG Praim Minista Peter O'Neill ibin go long miting emi bin tok climate change i ronim pinis sampla pipal blong en olsem ol pipal blong Caterets long Autonomous rijan blong Bougainville.Tasol Ursula Rakova lida blong ol Caterets pipal long Autonomous rijan blong Bougainville itok olsem emi gutpla ol Pacific lida itoktok long climate change tasol oli mas stat nau long help tru ol pipal na noken maus wara nating.Emi tok tu olsem United Nations isave givim moni long halvim wok blong helpim ol pipal husat i bungim heve long climate change tasol ol Pacific gavman ino save helpim ol pipal blong ol long despla.Despla moni em United Nations isave givim oli kolim long Climate Change Adaptation Fund.Nupela tingting blong pipol oli bin putim aut nau tasol i soim olsem Australia Opposisen bai inap kisim wanpela long tupela praimeri vout long Septemba ileksen.Nupela tingting blong pipol ibin tok ol heve blong nau insait long Australia gavaman ibin daunim tru gutpela neim blong praim minista wantaim ol pipol na daunim praimeri vout blong em inap tasol long <NUM> pesen.Nius poll oa tingting blong pipol em oli raitim long Australia nius pepa ibin soim olsem Opposisen bai inap winim olgeta tupela praimeri vout long Septemba ileksen.Dispela wok painim ibin tok praimeri sapot blong Opposisen ibin igo antap long sikis point long <NUM> pesen na i igo pas long Labor pati nau istap long gavaman long tupela pati em pipol i laikim long <NUM> pesen na Labor <NUM>.Dispela wok painim ibin kamap wanpela wik bihain long Australia gavaman ino bin nap long kamapim nupela media loa pait long lida-aip long pati na planti Minista ibin pinis long wok blong ol.Tripela Minista ibin pinis narapela Praim Minista ibin rausim em bihain long em ibin traim askim Kevin Rudd long kam bek olsem Praim Minista-tasol Kevin Rudd ibin tok bihain olsem em bai inonap sanap resis long lida-sip.Dispela wik Praim Minista Julia Gillard bai igo lukluk long Western Australia we Labor i holim tasol tripela long fiftin seats long Federal Palimen.Dispela wok painim oa nius poll ibin soim tu olsem lida blong Opposisen Tony Abbot i strongim namba blong em olsem pipol i laikim em olsem Praim Minista na namba blong en igo antap long faiv points long <NUM> pesen.Na mak blong Praim Minista ibin pundaun igo daun long <NUM> points dispela mak i bin daun tru stat long <NUM>.Greek President Carolos Papoulias bai holim ol miting wantaim tripela bikpela pati long traim kamapim wanpela koalisin gavman.President blong Greece Karolos Papoulias bai bungim ol lida blong tripela bikpela pati long traim kamapim wanpela koalisin gavman na ol ino ken holim narapela ileksin.Tripela pati ibin winim bikpela namba blong vout long Sande las wik ileksin tasol ol i feil long kamapim wanpela bung gavman oa koalisin.Ol wok painim i soim narapela ileksin bai larem far left party i win na dispela bai bagarapim membasip blong Greece long Eurozone.European Commission President Jose Manuel Barroso i tok sapos Greece i laik stap insait long eurozone emi mas soim respekt long ol loa blongen.I very much respect the Greek democracy and of course the Greek power.But I also have to respect the other sikstin parliaments that have approved the program he said.So of course the agreements have to be respected by everybody.And if the agreements are not respected it means that we are not in the conditions to continue with a country that does not respect the agreements.Ol meri long rural area long Papua New Guinea i gat rait long rid na rait long halivim sindaon long ples.Despla toktok ibin kam long Community Engagement na Development Officer wantem New Britain Palm Oil Ltd Diane Mandui Mirio.Mrs Mirio ibin mekim despla toktok long namba tri PNG Leadership symposium em oli bin kamap long stat blong despla mun long Deakin University long Geelong long Victoria state blong Australia Mrs Mirio itok taem i senis pinis long kantri na ol meri na mama long ol asples imas save long despla tupla bikpla samting long wonem sopos nogat bai oli wok long bungim ol heve iet.Goroka Development Officer Donald Gumbisa husat i wanpla lecturer long Universiti blong Gorok Development Officer Donald Gumbisa.i tok bikpela samting em long ol pikinini i mas go skul long kisim save na tru long kisim wok na moni tasol save em long ol pkinini i ken usim tu long lukautim sindaon long ples.Mrs Mirio ibin wokbung wantem Mr Donald Gumbis husat i wanpla lecturer long Universiti blong Goroka long tokim despla symposium long Leadership women na literacy long Papua New Guinea.Pastem tru Caroline Tiriman ibin askim Mrs Mirio long stori.<NUM> Australian Veteran ol olpela soljia bai hap blong <NUM> yar aniveseri long Kokoda Beachheads long dispela wik.Wanpela lain ol lapun soljia blong Australia em oli bin pait long Kokoda na Beachheads long Papua New Guinea bai igo bek long wik bihain long ples oli bin pait long en long makim <NUM> yar anivesari.Dispela bikpela pait em ibin pasim strong blong Japan long kisim Papua New Guinea long Second World War.Pait long Kokoda na Beacheads ibin hatpela pait stret em lukim moa long <NUM> ol Australia soldia ibin lusim laif blong ol na tu moa long <NUM> ol arapela ibin kisim bikpela bagarap.Na sampela ibin kisim ol bikpela sik.Tim Bryson First Secretary long Australia High Komisin long Port Moresby i tokim John Papik dispela seremoni i bikpela samting we ol lapun veterans ol soljia iet bai stap insait long bung blong makim <NUM> yar taim pait i pinis.Gavana Willim Powi itok Liquor Ban or tambu long ol strongpela drink insait long Southern Highlands Province bai igo hed yet.Gavana Poi itok Liquor Ban or tambu long ol strongpela drink insait long province bai igo hed yet maski igat sampela liklik lain iwok long toktok agensim.MR Powi ibin mekim despela toktok bilong bekim ol toktok bilong Southern Highlands Chamber of Commerce President Berry Mini husat i tok olsem tambuim bilong ol strongpela drink long Provins ino bin wok gutpela.Tasol gavana Powi itok bia na ol kainkain alkohol dring ibin magarapim nogut sindaun blong pipol na gavman blong Southern Highlands Provins long bipo.Em itok ibingat planti loa na oda isiu na ol pait i save kamap long femili na olgeta hap olgeta taim.Ol ibin tambuim ol strongpela drink insait long Southern Highlands liklik mao long tupela yar igo pinis na nau tasol Provincail Gavman bilong William Powi ibin wanbel long larim despela tambu bai mas istap yet olsem.Tripla man complain long wanem wok em stap long time long ples graun.Bricklayer tok wok blon em kamap pas bikos ol lain Egypt wokim pyramid long time bipo.Kampenta tok wok blon em stap long time long wanem sip blon Noah ol wokim pas.Pawa man lap isi tasol na tok time bikman tok there shall be light.Na yutupla ting husait tru sanap long main switch board.Wanpela boss crew blo bus ron long Wau Lae highway.Bagaros em boy sepik na em wantaim draiva bilong em collektim ol pasindia long go lo Lae.Igat gutpela namba liklik bilong ol pasindia ibin kalap long bus <NUM> sitter coaster bus tasol ol iwok long raun yet painim sampela moa pasindia.Bus igo stop nau boss crew kalap kam daun tasol sanap long dua bilong go autside long bus tasol tokim ol pasindia long go daun.Na dasal mi tok nadasal wologeta kwan dan kwan dan nadasal.Nau tasol mi tok olgeta go daun.go daun nau tasol.Bagaros ino laik tok save olsem taia flat na ol i bai senisim nogat em opim dua tasol hatim stret ol pasindia long go daun.Tok pisin tasol em brukim stret nogat yu ken kaikai maus blo ass blo yu tata na go lo haus.From Delilah Kond wanpla besti salim disla kam oh shshs laf lo u yet Woman asks If I sleep with tri men everyone calls me a Pamuk.But when a man sleeps with et girls everyone calls him Pawa Mangi.How come.Man replies Very simple.When one lock can be opened by tri different keys it's called a bad lock.But when one key can open et different locks we call it a Master Key.Mams paps oh taim yu save cross lo mi mi save go na klinim na brasim toilet.Digicel pomotion is kamap na boi ros i ringim missus long nupla namba blong em.Missus i ansa na tok i love my digicel.Boi ros kirap bekim Congratulations you just won my tapiok.Missus bel kaskas na tok Yu harem mi sore long yu yah avinun yu kam long haus bai nogat kaikai yu bai kaikai tapiok blo yu yet na slip.Man hagen kalap lo balus na go lo mosby fisrst taim blo em.na stewardess askim em yu laikim coffee wantaim sugar na milk man hagen girap na shame too wantaim merry luk luk lo em man should be entered by the subscribers themselves.Otherwise Enjoy.Tripla spak maik stopim wanpla taxi cab na kalap long en.Driva skelim olsem olgeta i bom dai olgeta so em putim on engin blo car putim off ken na tok ok mipla kamap pinis.Wanpla spak maik givim moni lo taxi driva na narapla tok tenkyu tasol last spak maik kam autsait lo car na lusim wanpla han lo pes blo driva.Driva ting olsem last spak maik i luk save lo rong blo em na em askim why yu paitim mi.Last Spak maik kirap na tok yu longlong ah.why yu spidim car inap lo yu kilim mipla ya.Wanpla turist laik go hagen show na em kalap long balus na sindaun klostu wantaim wanpla kange balus go antap nau turist askim hamas save yu gat long PNG na em bekim o mistap Mosbi pikini meri wok Lae Pikini man marit Rabaul mix Buka na liklik nau.Waitman belhat na singaut You Son of a Bitch Look at What You've Done.Man PNG tu belhat na bekim Na Yu Tu Sanap lo bris yah.Wanpla sumatin go bek lo ples na mitim gf blo em tupla stori na man tokim meri I love you baby meri kirap na tok dont baby me like you born me Mama karim nupela pikinini na bikpela pikinini meri i save kros long wanem bebi i stap long susu olgeta taim na i luk olsem mama lus tinktink long nambawan pikinini.Olsem na em i tinktink i stap hau bai mi stretim wari bilong mi.Nogat em painim sampela marasin nogut long bus na wilwilim gut na wokim sampela samting nogut longen em i ting olsem taim ol i slip mi putim sampela marasin long susu bilong mama na kwiktaim dispela binatang bebi bai pinis.Tudak pinis ol i slip na em i wokim olsem.Tulait bruk i go ausait na waswas na bihain harim mama i krai.Meri i go long hap na tok olsem wanem.Na mama bekim tok olsem trangu Papa bilong yu indai pinis.Misis laik beten lo kaikai na boi ros kam sidaun na olgeta samting lo trausis kapsait kam autsait.Misis lukim na tok bipo lo yumi beten displa em no ples blo kros-pait.So inap yupla haitim ol stick ston blo yupla.Pasto askim congragatson blo m lo church na no save spak man to m stap.m singaut umi olgeta lo hea u sait em karem pawa.ol man singaut Jesus.spak man stap baksit mete singaut cam PNG Powa.ol man meri ol tanim fes go lo m_ na pasto singaut ken u sait m karem pawa.olgeta singaut gen Jesus na spak ma sigaun gen PNG powa.nau bel blo pasto m kaskas nau.nau m singaut <NUM> one nau.u sait i gat powa.olget sinagaut Jesus na sipak man singaut PNG powa gen nau pasto kiram na tok I cast u in da naim of Jesus.sipak man singaut cam n I blok it na crosim han blo m.Lapun yah bikpla sick kisim em na klostu em bai dai nau.Em slip lo bed tasol na stap.Morning em kirap na lukim lapun meri kukim lamp flaps blo breakfast.Tingim em docta tambu lo em lo kaikai bikos em bai dai klostu tasol paps kirap tasol putim han go lo kisim wanpla.Lapun mams kirap paitim han blo em na tokim em oi lusim yah em blo haus karai blo yu yah From Jack Steven Wanpela paps go long Lae show na lukim ol wait man kalap long parasut.Man tingting kilim em taim em igo bek long peles sampela dei bihain.Wanpela morning taim em kirap na tokim ol lain long peles olsem em bai soim wanpela nupela samting ol wait i mekim na em lukim long show.Boy kisim ambrela bilong tambu meri bilong em na tokim ol lain long peles kam bung long as bilong wanpela bikpela diwai namel long peles.Bagaros igo antap pinis em opim ambrela na tok em bai kalap na bai flot isi isi kam daun man indai bilong em stret taim em kalap na ambrela ya wind opim.Ol isave tok PNG land of the unexpected ha ha ha ha ha.Tasol gel pren tu ya blari sit em ino lukluk ikam long tapiok blong em.Em bisi nambaut tasol long kamautim garas arere long ol taro.Olsem na man papa ya em tait igo bagarap olgeta nau.Yu save em lukim hau gel pren i wok long kamautim ol garas na emi kisim filings.Leva blong em tu i ron hariap liklik na wei em i pulim win nau man kolostu em bai kamautim ol lip bilong tapiok tu ya.<NUM> meri PNG maretim waitman na tupla gat haus igat swimming pool.Taim tupla laik go swim tupla save hamamas na pilai igo ikam namel long tupla yet.<NUM> taim tupla swim stap na pokim pokim sait blo tupela yet na kirap nogut meri ya kapupu insait long wara and bubble kamap antap long wara.Waitman blo em kirap nogut na askim honey what's that.Na em pointim go olsem long wara bubble baksait long meri blo em.Na meri tok Honey I tickle you you tickle me and I pepe win lol.Lapun man laik go lukim ol pupu blon en lon Mosbi na kam kalap lon balus.Lusim Wewak go insait lon balus nau stap liklik em laik go pispis na askim wokmeri lon balus meri ya kisim em go sowimem hap lon go pispis lapun man opim doa laik go isait kam bak out ken man hamas taim em makin olsen.Igo nau ken go askim meri ya lon balus mi laik go insait na olget taim mi go wanpla man stap insait.Meri ya kam lukimya nogat lapun lukim em yet lon mirror na ting wanpla man stap insait.Flying fox na spider koros cos flying fox stuck lo web blo spider na spider tokim flying fox-osem na mipla sa tok raun lo sun na ba u lukluk gut na flying fox tokim spider u too lukluk gut na tromai fishin net blo u meikim na m kam pas lo diwai.Papa na pikinini tupela i laik igo toromoi huk long painim pis.Tupela i wok long redim kanu i stap na Papa i tokim pikinini Yumi tupela pasim ai na yumi pre pastem bifo yumi go antap long solwara.Papa i pre Got Papa mitupela pikinini i laik go hukim pis.Mitupela i pre olsem bai you givim planti pis long mitupela.Sapos yu givim planti pis long mitupela bai mitupela givim ol bikpela pis long yu na ol liklik tasol bai mitupela karim igo long peles.Wanpela waitman go long sepik na paitim guitar stap na singsing.Wanpela ples man go sanap na tok ah master guitar em kaikai blong en stret yah.Waitman kirap na askim narapela man sanap stap What did he say.Man yah tu no save gut long tok english so em i tok No he said guitar is your food.Wanpla hia blo yupla olgeta Wanpla Pastor autim tok lo haus lotu stap na tokim ol congregation blo em olsem yupla ol lain save bikhet na les long lotu yupla mas save olsem taim yupla dai bai yupla olgeta go long hell na sigirapim ol tit teeth blo yupla long hap na singaut stap.Baksait long haus lotu ya wanpla papa olgeta tit bruk pinis sindaun stap na isi em apim han go antap na askim pasta Pasta na olsem wanem long mipla ol lain nau nogat tit hia long graun ya.Pasta tanim tasol na tokim em papa noken wari husat nau yu nogat tit ol bai givim yu nupla long hell na yu bai kaikai blo yu long hap.Top day na wiken lo yupla.Wanpla man go lo buai market na kaikai buai stap lo side blo PRL.Em stori wantaim buai seller ya na em tokim em Aye ol Oyaba bai kam play lo PRL ya na buai seller kirap na tok Larim ol kam ol Kumuls bai winim ol ya Displa em i kamap lon Enga lon Wapanemanda.Olgeta Lapun lon up ol i harim olsem wanpla blo oI go lon Mosbi na i kam bek wantaim nupela bikpela sik ol i kolim kolwara.Ol i harim olsem kolwara i kilim planti nambis man lo Mosbi yet na ol poret i stret lon displa sik.Nau i gat wanpla lapun i save gut lon olgeta sik blon ples na blon ol waitman self promote.Em i singautim olgeta manmeri lon ples lon kam bung nau em givim displa traipla toksave Aye Aye yubla ol manmeri herim herim.Kain sik olsem ino bin kamab pibo pibo em kamab nau tete.Aste yumi thing em sik kolwara cholera yah.Nau tadol mi mbin harem lo radiyo Tok pisin radio nogat em solwara yah.Na emb ingo tu lon Siaban na kilim blanti manbmeri na emb wokim na wanbla blant ol i kolimb yu klia Blant emb i hot olsem sun.Na displa solwara nau em bai i kam pundaun lo yumi olsem rain.They were misinformed in regards to Cholera.It is now well regarded in Enga as Kolwara.Wanpla fisherman baem sampla man alpim em wokim wanpla niupla kanu blo em.Kanu pinis na em kusai lo misis blo em-hamamas wantem.Em kisim meri blo em lo niupla kanu blo em na go road-testim.Tupla stap longwe lo nambis na mama pilim pispis na isi tasol sindaun lo poret blo kanu givim baksait lo papa na pispis insait.Papa em givim baksait olim string na em harim wara ron na tanim man em belhat stret na singaut antap lo mama korosim em Why yu pispis lo kanu blo mi.Yu mas longlong or wanem.Tupla pul go bek lo nambis na em still komplen lo mama kamap lo nambis na komplen yet.Mama belhat nau na sem wantem tanim lo papa na singaut strong lo em Mi pispis wanpla taem t'sol lo kanu blo yu na yu ino isi lo komplen yu save pispis lo kanu blo mi olgeta nait ya mino save komplen Wanpela lapun harim wanpela tolai rock band singsing lo Meri na em tok ol png band save singsing lo ol meri tumas ol waitman orait ol save singsing lo ol baby tasol ha ha.Wanpla tisa is askim wanpla mangi igat sevenpla krismas long spellim cow.Mangi yah i paol long spellim na tisa i salim em go long haus.Papa bilong mangi yah i belhat nogut stret long tisa.Em go long skul na krosim tisa olsem Yu ting pikinini blo mi bikpla mangi na you krosim em ah.You skelim sais blo cow na sais blo em.Yu no laik tokim em lo spelim ol liklik samting inap lo size blo em.Kain olsem mosquito nabaut.From Tribal Mystic Ok wanpela joke blong wiken.Pasindia sip Totol karim ol lain igo daun long Finch na wanpela meri Sepik nem blong em Anga em kalap tu.Ol igo long sua nau ol lain wok sip na kepten ol singaut Tromwei Anga igo Tromwei Anga igo daun nau hariap.Tromwei Anga.Ol i minim long anga blong sip.Tasol taim meri Sepik Anga i harim em i panik pinis na em sanap hariap na ron igo long kepten na em putim tupela hand blong em olsem bosmeri long sait blong em na em singaut strong long kepten Ino inap na ino ken Anga tu em baim sip na em i kam.Anga em pikinini blong man ya ino inap yu tromwei em igo daun long solwara.Tupla turists kam slip lo wanpla backpaker accomodation blo wanpla farmer lo country side.Lo night farmer totok strong lo tupla Yutupla ken mekim samting lo laik blong yutupla tasol wanpla samting tasol mi no laikim yutupla lo tachim.Dispela m pikinini girl blo mi Orait wanpla taim long nait tupla kisim taim stret na nogat choice olsem na ol creep go lo rum blo pikinini girl lo nait.Taim farmer find out m askim tupla.Husat mekim.Na tupla wantaim putim han.ok punishment blo yutupla go lo farm na painim wanem best fruit na karim kam lo mi nau tasol First man karim bundle grapes kam.Farmer tok pusim wan wan long lo ass blo u.Taim man ya mekim m start lo laugh go bikpla stret nau.Na farmer askim.U laugh lo wanem.Nogat mi laugh lo friend blo mi ya m wok lo pickim pineapple stap.Okay mi no gutpla stret lo jokes but bai mi traim mi harim disla joke lo FB somewhere sorry disla em tokpisin mix English joke mi sa Hamamas lo readim ol joke lo disla wall Ol funny jokes stret Okay Wanpla png couple I sindaun lo restaurant na kaikai I stap.Lo klostu table tupla marit blo Europe I sindaun na husband I tok lo meri blo em Honey pass me the salt please Na lo narapla klostu table tu displa expatriate man askim meri blo em Sweetie pass me the salt please.Oh okay PNG man em tingting ol disla tupla foreign man callim meri blo ol lo samting ol i laikim so em I tok lo meri blo em Buai pass me the salt please Tisa kirap askim ol students ok yupla bin harim lo period blo ol meri bipo oh nogat.Kuti mangi lo baksait lo classroom kirap na bekim yes tisa las wik bikpla susa blo mi bin tok olsem em bin misim lo wanpla mun man taim ol hauslain harim olsem em mama blo mi faint papa blo mi kisim heart attack na hausboi blo mipla runaway.Wanpela miting bin kamap long wanpela ples na man husait igo pass long miting ino gutpela tumas long kamap siaman.Em iwok long tok hap pidgin na english na planti man long dispela ples ibin faul tru.Wanpela hap tok em isave tok em meaning.Em iwok long usim dispela hap tok na wanpela papa em harim igo na em faul olgeta na em askim siaman.Siaman dispela hap tok meaning em wanem kain tok stret siaman bekim olsem meaning long tok pisin em as bilong tok.Orait miting igo yet na paps pilim olsem em sindaun igo na mit blong bun as bilong em pen na em i laik sanap liklik.Em kirap tasol na singaut long siaman olsem siaman meaning bilong mi pen an mi laik sanap liklik na go raun autsaid na bihain mi kam bek long miting.Ha aha ha ha ha.Wanpla papa wantaim <NUM> pkinini blo em na misis blo em i wetim bus stap na wanpla aipas i kam.Taim bus i kamap nogat inap spes na misis wantaim ol pikinin tasol i kalap.Papa na aipas wanbel lo wokabaut.Taim tupla i go long rot san tu i hot na tupla tuhat stret.Antap long displa aipas tu i wokim traipla noise long paitim wokabaut stik long soim em rot.Papa i give up stret lo harim noise na tanim tokim aipas traim na putim ruba lo wokabaut stick blo yu em wokim planti noise tumas.Aipas belhat nogut true na tanim tokim papa ya Sapos yu bin putim ruba long stik blo yu bai mipla no nap wokabaut olsem.Wanpla lapun papa i sik na go lo haus sik.Nes sekim em na tokim em papa yu silip lo bet na bai mi givim yu wanpla sut.Lapun igo silip lo bet na bepo lo Nes is planim needle stret em tok pikini noken wokim nupla hul putim lo hul stap pinis ya.
